37 private bool enabled = true;
38 public bool Enabled
39 {
40 get
41 {
42 return enabled && !Removed;
43 }
44 set
45 {
46 if (value == enabled) return;
47
48 if (Removed)
49 {
50 enabled = false;
51 return;
52 }
53
54 enabled = value;
55
56 foreach (Limb limb in AnimController.Limbs)
57 {
58 if (limb.IsSevered) { continue; }
59 if (limb.body != null)
60 {
61 limb.body.Enabled = enabled;
62 }
63 UpdateLimbLightSource(limb);
64 }
65 AnimController.Collider.Enabled = value;
66 }
67 }

70 public Hull CurrentHull = null;
71
75 public bool IsRemotelyControlled
76 {
77 get
78 {
79 if (GameMain.NetworkMember == null)
80 {
81 return false;
82 }
83 else if (GameMain.NetworkMember.IsClient)
84 {
85 //all characters except the client's own character are controlled by the server
86 return this != Controlled;
87 }
88 else
89 {
90 return IsRemotePlayer;
91 }
92 }
93 }

155 protected readonly Dictionary<string, ActiveTeamChange> activeTeamChanges = new Dictionary<string, ActiveTeamChange>();
156 protected ActiveTeamChange currentTeamChange;
157 const string OriginalTeamIdentifier = "original";
158
159 public static void ThrowIfAccessingWalletsInSingleplayer()
160 {
161#if CLIENT && DEBUG
162 if (Screen.Selected is TestScreen) { return; }
163#endif
164 if (GameMain.NetworkMember is null || GameMain.IsSingleplayer)
165 {
166 throw new InvalidOperationException($"Tried to access crew wallets in singleplayer. Use {nameof(CampaignMode)}.{nameof(CampaignMode.Bank)} or {nameof(CampaignMode)}.{nameof(CampaignMode.GetWallet)} instead.");
167 }
168 }
169
170 public void SetOriginalTeam(CharacterTeamType newTeam)
171 {
172 TryRemoveTeamChange(OriginalTeamIdentifier);
173 currentTeamChange = new ActiveTeamChange(newTeam, ActiveTeamChange.TeamChangePriorities.Base);
174 TryAddNewTeamChange(OriginalTeamIdentifier, currentTeamChange);
175 }
176
177 protected void ChangeTeam(CharacterTeamType newTeam)
178 {
179 if (newTeam == teamID)
180 {
181 return;
182 }
183 teamID = newTeam;
184 if (info != null) { info.TeamID = newTeam; }
185
186 if (GameMain.NetworkMember != null && GameMain.NetworkMember.IsClient)
187 {
188 return;
189 }
190 // clear up any duties the character might have had from its old team (autonomous objectives are automatically recreated)
191 var order = OrderPrefab.Dismissal.CreateInstance(OrderPrefab.OrderTargetType.Entity, orderGiver: this).WithManualPriority(CharacterInfo.HighestManualOrderPriority);
192 SetOrder(order, isNewOrder: true, speak: false);
193
194#if SERVER
195 GameMain.NetworkMember.CreateEntityEvent(this, new TeamChangeEventData());
196#endif
197 }
198
199 public bool HasTeamChange(string identifier)
200 {
201 return activeTeamChanges.ContainsKey(identifier);
202 }
203
204 public bool TryAddNewTeamChange(string identifier, ActiveTeamChange newTeamChange)
205 {
206 bool success = activeTeamChanges.TryAdd(identifier, newTeamChange);
207 if (success)
208 {
209 if (currentTeamChange == null)
210 {
211 // set team logic to use active team changes as soon as the first team change is added
212 SetOriginalTeam(TeamID);
213 }
214 }
215 else
216 {
217#if DEBUG
218 DebugConsole.ThrowError("Tried to add an existing team change! Make sure to check if the team change exists first.");
219#endif
220 }
221 return success;
222 }
223 public bool TryRemoveTeamChange(string identifier)
224 {
225 if (activeTeamChanges.TryGetValue(identifier, out ActiveTeamChange removedTeamChange))
226 {
227 if (currentTeamChange == removedTeamChange)
228 {
229 currentTeamChange = activeTeamChanges[OriginalTeamIdentifier];
230 }
231 }
232 return activeTeamChanges.Remove(identifier);
233 }
234
235 public void UpdateTeam()
236 {
237 if (currentTeamChange == null)
238 {
239 return;
240 }
241
242 ActiveTeamChange bestTeamChange = currentTeamChange;
243 foreach (var desiredTeamChange in activeTeamChanges) // order of iteration matters because newest is preferred when multiple same-priority team changes exist
244 {
245 if (bestTeamChange.TeamChangePriority < desiredTeamChange.Value.TeamChangePriority)
246 {
247 bestTeamChange = desiredTeamChange.Value;
248 }
249 }
250 if (TeamID != bestTeamChange.DesiredTeamId)
251 {
252 ChangeTeam(bestTeamChange.DesiredTeamId);
253 currentTeamChange = bestTeamChange;
254
255 if (bestTeamChange.AggressiveBehavior) // this seemed like the least disruptive way to induce aggressive behavior
256 {
257 var order = OrderPrefab.Prefabs["fightintruders"].CreateInstance(OrderPrefab.OrderTargetType.Entity, orderGiver: this).WithManualPriority(CharacterInfo.HighestManualOrderPriority);
258 SetOrder(order, isNewOrder: true, speak: false);
259 }
260 }
261 }

374 public Vector2 AimRefPosition
375 {
376 get
377 {
378 if (ViewTarget == null) { return AnimController.AimSourcePos; }
379
380 Vector2 viewTargetWorldPos = ViewTarget.WorldPosition;
381 if (ViewTarget is Item targetItem)
382 {
383 Turret turret = targetItem.GetComponent<Turret>();
384 if (turret != null)
385 {
386 viewTargetWorldPos = new Vector2(
387 targetItem.WorldRect.X + turret.TransformedBarrelPos.X,
388 targetItem.WorldRect.Y - turret.TransformedBarrelPos.Y);
389 }
390 }
391 return Position + (viewTargetWorldPos - WorldPosition);
392 }
393 }

420
421 public string DisplayName
422 {
423 get
424 {
425 if (IsPet)
426 {
427 string petName = (AIController as EnemyAIController).PetBehavior.GetTagName();
428 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(petName)) { return petName; }
429 }
430
431 if (info != null && !string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(info.Name)) { return info.Name; }
432 LocalizedString displayName = Params.DisplayName;
433 if (displayName.IsNullOrWhiteSpace())
434 {
435 if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(Params.SpeciesTranslationOverride))
436 {
437 displayName = TextManager.Get($"Character.{SpeciesName}");
438 }
439 else
440 {
441 displayName = TextManager.Get($"Character.{Params.SpeciesTranslationOverride}");
442 }
443 }
444 return displayName.IsNullOrWhiteSpace() ? Name : displayName.Value;
445 }

552 public Character SelectedCharacter
553 {
554 get { return selectedCharacter; }
555 set
556 {
557 if (value == selectedCharacter) return;
558 if (selectedCharacter != null)
559 selectedCharacter.selectedBy = null;
560 selectedCharacter = value;
561 if (selectedCharacter != null)
562 selectedCharacter.selectedBy = this;
563
564#if CLIENT
565 CharacterHealth.SetHealthBarVisibility(value == null);
566#elif SERVER
567 if (value is { IsDead: true, Wallet: { Balance: var balance } grabbedWallet } && balance > 0)
568 {
569 if (GameMain.GameSession.Campaign is MultiPlayerCampaign mpCampaign)
570 {
571 mpCampaign.Bank.Give(balance);
572 }
573
574 grabbedWallet.Deduct(balance);
575 GameServer.Log($"{GameServer.CharacterLogName(this)} grabbed {value.Name}'s body and received {grabbedWallet.Balance} mk.", ServerLog.MessageType.Money);
576 }
577#endif
578 }
579 }

779
780 private Item _selectedConstruction;
781 public Item SelectedConstruction
782 {
783 get => _selectedConstruction;
784 set
785 {
786 var prevSelectedConstruction = _selectedConstruction;
787 _selectedConstruction = value;
788#if CLIENT
789 HintManager.OnSetSelectedConstruction(this, prevSelectedConstruction, _selectedConstruction);
790 if (Controlled == this)
791 {
792 if (_selectedConstruction == null)
793 {
794 GameMain.GameSession?.CrewManager?.ResetCrewList();
795 }
796 else if (_selectedConstruction.GetComponent<Ladder>() == null)
797 {
798 GameMain.GameSession?.CrewManager?.AutoHideCrewList();
799 }
800 }
801#endif
802 if (prevSelectedConstruction == null && _selectedConstruction != null)
803 {
804 itemSelectedTime = Timing.TotalTime;
805 }
806 else if (prevSelectedConstruction != null && _selectedConstruction == null && itemSelectedTime > 0)
807 {
808 if (!itemSelectedDurations.ContainsKey(prevSelectedConstruction.Prefab))
809 {
810 itemSelectedDurations.Add(prevSelectedConstruction.Prefab, 0);
811 }
812 itemSelectedDurations[prevSelectedConstruction.Prefab] += Timing.TotalTime - itemSelectedTime;
813 itemSelectedTime = 0;
814 }
815 }
816 }

848 Revive();
849 }
850 }

882 //can other characters access the inventory of this character
883 private bool canInventoryBeAccessed = true;
884 public bool CanInventoryBeAccessed
885 {
886 get
887 {
888 if (!canInventoryBeAccessed || Removed || Inventory == null) { return false; }
889 if (!Inventory.AccessibleWhenAlive)
890 {
891 return IsDead;
892 }
893 else
894 {
895 return IsKnockedDown || LockHands || IsBot && IsOnPlayerTeam;
896 }
897 }
898 set { canInventoryBeAccessed = value; }
899 }

916 private bool accessRemovedCharacterErrorShown;
917 public override Vector2 SimPosition
918 {
919 get
920 {
921 if (AnimController?.Collider == null)
922 {
923 if (!accessRemovedCharacterErrorShown)
924 {
925 string errorMsg = "Attempted to access a potentially removed character. Character: [name], id: " + ID + ", removed: " + Removed + ".";
926 if (AnimController == null)
927 {
928 errorMsg += " AnimController == null";
929 }
930 else if (AnimController.Collider == null)
931 {
932 errorMsg += " AnimController.Collider == null";
933 }
934 errorMsg += '\n' + Environment.StackTrace.CleanupStackTrace();
935 DebugConsole.NewMessage(errorMsg.Replace("[name]", Name), Color.Red);
936 GameAnalyticsManager.AddErrorEventOnce(
937 "Character.SimPosition:AccessRemoved",
938 GameAnalyticsManager.ErrorSeverity.Error,
939 errorMsg.Replace("[name]", SpeciesName.Value) + "\n" + Environment.StackTrace.CleanupStackTrace());
940 accessRemovedCharacterErrorShown = true;
941 }
942 return Vector2.Zero;
943 }
944
945 return AnimController.Collider.SimPosition;
946 }
947 }

1006 public static Character Create(Identifier speciesName, Vector2 position, string seed, CharacterInfo characterInfo = null, ushort id = Entity.NullEntityID, bool isRemotePlayer = false, bool hasAi = true, bool createNetworkEvent = true, RagdollParams ragdoll = null)
1007 {

1009 if (prefab == null)
1010 {
1011 DebugConsole.ThrowError($"Failed to create character \"{speciesName}\". Matching prefab not found.\n" + Environment.StackTrace);
1012 return null;

1014 return Create(prefab, position, seed, characterInfo, id, isRemotePlayer, hasAi, createNetworkEvent, ragdoll);

1017 public static Character Create(CharacterPrefab prefab, Vector2 position, string seed, CharacterInfo characterInfo = null, ushort id = Entity.NullEntityID, bool isRemotePlayer = false, bool hasAi = true, bool createNetworkEvent = true, RagdollParams ragdoll = null)
1018 {
1019 Character newCharacter = null;
1020 if (prefab.Identifier != CharacterPrefab.HumanSpeciesName)
1021 {
1022 var aiCharacter = new AICharacter(prefab, position, seed, characterInfo, id, isRemotePlayer, ragdoll);
1023 var ai = new EnemyAIController(aiCharacter, seed);
1024 aiCharacter.SetAI(ai);
1025 newCharacter = aiCharacter;
1026 }
1027 else if (hasAi)
1028 {
1029 var aiCharacter = new AICharacter(prefab, position, seed, characterInfo, id, isRemotePlayer, ragdoll);
1030 var ai = new HumanAIController(aiCharacter);
1031 aiCharacter.SetAI(ai);
1032 newCharacter = aiCharacter;
1033 }
1034 else
1035 {
1036 newCharacter = new Character(prefab, position, seed, characterInfo, id, isRemotePlayer, ragdoll);
1037 }
1038
1039#if SERVER
1040 if (GameMain.Server != null && Spawner != null && createNetworkEvent)
1041 {
1042 Spawner.CreateNetworkEvent(new EntitySpawner.SpawnEntity(newCharacter));
1043 }
1044#endif
1045
1046 GameMain.LuaCs.Hook.Call("characterCreated", new object[] { newCharacter });
1047
1048 return newCharacter;
1049 }

1051 private Character(Submarine submarine, ushort id): base(submarine, id)
1052 {
1053 wallet = new Wallet(Option<Character>.Some(this));
1054 }
1055
1056 protected Character(CharacterPrefab prefab, Vector2 position, string seed, CharacterInfo characterInfo = null, ushort id = Entity.NullEntityID, bool isRemotePlayer = false, RagdollParams ragdollParams = null)
1057 : this(null, id)
1058 {
1059 this.Seed = seed;
1060 this.Prefab = prefab;
1061 MTRandom random = new MTRandom(ToolBox.StringToInt(seed));
1062
1063 IsRemotePlayer = isRemotePlayer;
1064
1065 oxygenAvailable = 100.0f;
1066 aiTarget = new AITarget(this);
1067
1068 lowPassMultiplier = 1.0f;
1069
1070 Properties = SerializableProperty.GetProperties(this);
1071
1072 Params = new CharacterParams(prefab.ContentFile as CharacterFile);
1073
1074 Info = characterInfo;
1075
1076 Identifier speciesName = prefab.Identifier;
1077
1078 if (VariantOf == CharacterPrefab.HumanSpeciesName || speciesName == CharacterPrefab.HumanSpeciesName)
1079 {
1080 if (!VariantOf.IsEmpty)
1081 {
1082 DebugConsole.ThrowError("The variant system does not yet support humans, sorry. It does support other humanoids though!");
1083 }
1084 if (characterInfo == null)
1085 {
1086 Info = new CharacterInfo(CharacterPrefab.HumanSpeciesName);
1087 }
1088 }
1089 if (Info != null)
1090 {
1091 teamID = Info.TeamID;
1092 }
1093 keys = new Key[Enum.GetNames(typeof(InputType)).Length];
1094 for (int i = 0; i < Enum.GetNames(typeof(InputType)).Length; i++)
1095 {
1096 keys[i] = new Key((InputType)i);
1097 }
1098
1099 var mainElement = prefab.ConfigElement;
1100 InitProjSpecific(mainElement);
1101
1102 List<ContentXElement> inventoryElements = new List<ContentXElement>();
1103 List<float> inventoryCommonness = new List<float>();
1104 List<ContentXElement> healthElements = new List<ContentXElement>();
1105 List<float> healthCommonness = new List<float>();
1106 foreach (var subElement in mainElement.Elements())
1107 {
1108 switch (subElement.Name.ToString().ToLowerInvariant())
1109 {
1110 case "inventory":
1111 inventoryElements.Add(subElement);
1112 inventoryCommonness.Add(subElement.GetAttributeFloat("commonness", 1.0f));
1113 break;
1114 case "health":
1115 healthElements.Add(subElement);
1116 healthCommonness.Add(subElement.GetAttributeFloat("commonness", 1.0f));
1117 break;
1118 case "statuseffect":
1119 var statusEffect = StatusEffect.Load(subElement, Name);
1120 if (statusEffect != null)
1121 {
1122 if (!statusEffects.ContainsKey(statusEffect.type))
1123 {
1124 statusEffects.Add(statusEffect.type, new List<StatusEffect>());
1125 }
1126 statusEffects[statusEffect.type].Add(statusEffect);
1127 }
1128 break;
1129 }
1130 }
1131 if (Params.VariantFile != null)
1132 {
1133 var overrideElement = Params.VariantFile.Root.FromPackage(Params.MainElement.ContentPackage);
1134 // Only override if the override file contains matching elements
1135 if (overrideElement.GetChildElement("inventory") != null)
1136 {
1137 inventoryElements.Clear();
1138 inventoryCommonness.Clear();
1139 foreach (var subElement in overrideElement.GetChildElements("inventory"))
1140 {
1141 switch (subElement.Name.ToString().ToLowerInvariant())
1142 {
1143 case "inventory":
1144 inventoryElements.Add(subElement);
1145 inventoryCommonness.Add(subElement.GetAttributeFloat("commonness", 1.0f));
1146 break;
1147 }
1148 }
1149 }
1150 if (overrideElement.GetChildElement("health") != null)
1151 {
1152 healthElements.Clear();
1153 healthCommonness.Clear();
1154 foreach (var subElement in overrideElement.GetChildElements("health"))
1155 {
1156 healthElements.Add(subElement);
1157 healthCommonness.Add(subElement.GetAttributeFloat("commonness", 1.0f));
1158 }
1159 }
1160 }
1161
1162 if (inventoryElements.Count > 0)
1163 {
1164 Inventory = new CharacterInventory(
1165 inventoryElements.Count == 1 ? inventoryElements[0] : ToolBox.SelectWeightedRandom(inventoryElements, inventoryCommonness, random),
1166 this);
1167 }
1168 if (healthElements.Count == 0)
1169 {
1170 CharacterHealth = new CharacterHealth(this);
1171 }
1172 else
1173 {
1174 var selectedHealthElement = healthElements.Count == 1 ? healthElements[0] : ToolBox.SelectWeightedRandom(healthElements, healthCommonness, random);
1175 // If there's no limb elements defined in the override variant, let's use the limb health definitions of the original file.
1176 var limbHealthElement = selectedHealthElement;
1177 if (Params.VariantFile != null && limbHealthElement.GetChildElement("limb") == null)
1178 {
1179 limbHealthElement = Params.OriginalElement.GetChildElement("health");
1180 }
1181 CharacterHealth = new CharacterHealth(selectedHealthElement, this, limbHealthElement);
1182 }
1183
1184 if (Params.Husk && speciesName != "husk")
1185 {
1186 // Get the non husked name and find the ragdoll with it
1187 var matchingAffliction = AfflictionPrefab.List
1188 .Where(p => p is AfflictionPrefabHusk)
1189 .Select(p => p as AfflictionPrefabHusk)
1190 .FirstOrDefault(p => p.TargetSpecies.Any(t => t == AfflictionHusk.GetNonHuskedSpeciesName(speciesName, p)));
1191 Identifier nonHuskedSpeciesName = Identifier.Empty;
1192 if (matchingAffliction == null)
1193 {
1194 DebugConsole.ThrowError("Cannot find a husk infection that matches this species! Please add the speciesnames as 'targets' in the husk affliction prefab definition!");
1195 // Crashes if we fail to create a ragdoll -> Let's just use some ragdoll so that the user sees the error msg.
1196 nonHuskedSpeciesName = IsHumanoid ? CharacterPrefab.HumanSpeciesName : "crawler".ToIdentifier();
1197 speciesName = nonHuskedSpeciesName;
1198 }
1199 else
1200 {
1201 nonHuskedSpeciesName = AfflictionHusk.GetNonHuskedSpeciesName(speciesName, matchingAffliction);
1202 }
1203 if (ragdollParams == null && prefab.VariantOf == null)
1204 {
1205 Identifier name = Params.UseHuskAppendage ? nonHuskedSpeciesName : speciesName;
1206 ragdollParams = IsHumanoid ? RagdollParams.GetDefaultRagdollParams<HumanRagdollParams>(name) : RagdollParams.GetDefaultRagdollParams<FishRagdollParams>(name) as RagdollParams;
1207 }
1208 if (Params.HasInfo && info == null)
1209 {
1210 info = new CharacterInfo(nonHuskedSpeciesName);
1211 }
1212 }
1213 else if (Params.HasInfo && info == null)
1214 {
1215 info = new CharacterInfo(speciesName);
1216 }
1217
1218 if (IsHumanoid)
1219 {
1220 AnimController = new HumanoidAnimController(this, seed, ragdollParams as HumanRagdollParams)
1221 {
1222 TargetDir = Direction.Right
1223 };
1224 }
1225 else
1226 {
1227 AnimController = new FishAnimController(this, seed, ragdollParams as FishRagdollParams);
1228 PressureProtection = int.MaxValue;
1229 }
1230
1231 AnimController.SetPosition(ConvertUnits.ToSimUnits(position));
1232
1233 AnimController.FindHull(null);
1234 if (AnimController.CurrentHull != null) { Submarine = AnimController.CurrentHull.Submarine; }
1235
1236 CharacterList.Add(this);
1237
1238 //characters start disabled in the multiplayer mode, and are enabled if/when
1239 // - controlled by the player
1240 // - client receives a position update from the server
1241 // - server receives an input message from the client controlling the character
1242 // - if an AICharacter, the server enables it when close enough to any of the players
1243 Enabled = GameMain.NetworkMember == null;
1244
1245 if (info != null)
1246 {
1247 LoadHeadAttachments();
1248 }
1249 ApplyStatusEffects(ActionType.OnSpawn, 1.0f);
1250 }
1251 partial void InitProjSpecific(ContentXElement mainElement);

1253 public void ReloadHead(int? headId = null, int hairIndex = -1, int beardIndex = -1, int moustacheIndex = -1, int faceAttachmentIndex = -1)
1254 {
1255 if (Info == null) { return; }
1256 var head = AnimController.GetLimb(LimbType.Head);
1257 if (head == null) { return; }
1258 HashSet<Identifier> tags = Info.Head.Preset.TagSet.ToHashSet();
1259 if (headId.HasValue)
1260 {
1261 tags.RemoveWhere(t => t.StartsWith("variant"));
1262 tags.Add($"variant{headId.Value}".ToIdentifier());
1263 }
1264 Info.RecreateHead(tags.ToImmutableHashSet(), hairIndex, beardIndex, moustacheIndex, faceAttachmentIndex);
1265#if CLIENT
1266 head.RecreateSprites();
1267#endif
1268 LoadHeadAttachments();
1269 }
1270
1271 public void LoadHeadAttachments()
1272 {
1273 if (Info == null) { return; }
1274 if (AnimController == null) { return; }
1275 var head = AnimController.GetLimb(LimbType.Head);
1276 if (head == null) { return; }
1277 // Note that if there are any other wearables on the head, they are removed here.
1278 head.OtherWearables.ForEach(w => w.Sprite.Remove());
1279 head.OtherWearables.Clear();
1280
1281 //if the element has not been set at this point, the character has no hair and the index should be zero (= no hair)
1282 if (info.Head.FaceAttachment == null) { info.Head.FaceAttachmentIndex = 0; }
1283 Info.Head.FaceAttachment?.GetChildElements("sprite").ForEach(s => head.OtherWearables.Add(new WearableSprite(s, WearableType.FaceAttachment)));
1284 if (info.Head.BeardElement == null) { info.Head.BeardIndex = 0; }
1285 Info.Head.BeardElement?.GetChildElements("sprite").ForEach(s => head.OtherWearables.Add(new WearableSprite(s, WearableType.Beard)));
1286 if (info.Head.MoustacheElement == null) { info.Head.MoustacheIndex = 0; }
1287 Info.Head.MoustacheElement?.GetChildElements("sprite").ForEach(s => head.OtherWearables.Add(new WearableSprite(s, WearableType.Moustache)));
1288 if (info.Head.HairElement == null) { info.Head.HairIndex = 0; }
1289 Info.Head.HairElement?.GetChildElements("sprite").ForEach(s => head.OtherWearables.Add(new WearableSprite(s, WearableType.Hair)));
1290
1291#if CLIENT
1292 if (info.Head?.HairWithHatElement?.GetChildElement("sprite") != null)
1293 {
1294 head.HairWithHatSprite = new WearableSprite(info.Head.HairWithHatElement.GetChildElement("sprite"), WearableType.Hair);
1295 }
1296 head.EnableHuskSprite = Params.Husk;
1297 head.LoadHerpesSprite();
1298 head.UpdateWearableTypesToHide();
1299#endif
1300 }

1302 public bool IsKeyHit(InputType inputType)
1303 {
1304#if SERVER
1305 if (GameMain.Server != null && IsRemotePlayer)
1306 {
1307 switch (inputType)
1308 {
1309 case InputType.Left:
1310 return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Left) && !prevDequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Left);
1311 case InputType.Right:
1312 return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Right) && !prevDequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Right);
1313 case InputType.Up:
1314 return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Up) && !prevDequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Up);
1315 case InputType.Down:
1316 return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Down) && !prevDequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Down);
1317 case InputType.Run:
1318 return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Run) && prevDequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Run);
1319 case InputType.Crouch:
1320 return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Crouch) && !prevDequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Crouch);
1321 case InputType.Select:
1322 return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Select); //TODO: clean up the way this input is registered
1323 case InputType.Deselect:
1324 return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Deselect);
1325 case InputType.Health:
1326 return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Health);
1327 case InputType.Grab:
1328 return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Grab);
1329 case InputType.Use:
1330 return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Use) && !prevDequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Use);
1331 case InputType.Shoot:
1332 return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Shoot) && !prevDequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Shoot);
1333 case InputType.Ragdoll:
1334 return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Ragdoll) && !prevDequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Ragdoll);
1335 default:
1336 return false;
1337 }
1338 }
1339#endif
1340
1341 return keys[(int)inputType].Hit;
1342 }
1343
1344 public bool IsKeyDown(InputType inputType)
1345 {
1346#if SERVER
1347 if (GameMain.Server != null && IsRemotePlayer)
1348 {
1349 switch (inputType)
1350 {
1351 case InputType.Left:
1352 return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Left);
1353 case InputType.Right:
1354 return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Right);
1355 case InputType.Up:
1356 return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Up);
1357 case InputType.Down:
1358 return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Down);
1359 case InputType.Run:
1360 return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Run);
1361 case InputType.Crouch:
1362 return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Crouch);
1363 case InputType.Select:
1364 return false; //TODO: clean up the way this input is registered
1365 case InputType.Deselect:
1366 return false;
1367 case InputType.Aim:
1368 return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Aim);
1369 case InputType.Use:
1370 return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Use);
1371 case InputType.Shoot:
1372 return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Shoot);
1373 case InputType.Attack:
1374 return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Attack);
1375 case InputType.Ragdoll:
1376 return dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.Ragdoll);
1377 }
1378 return false;
1379 }
1380#endif
1381 if (inputType == InputType.Up || inputType == InputType.Down ||
1382 inputType == InputType.Left || inputType == InputType.Right)
1383 {
1384 var invertControls = CharacterHealth.GetAffliction("invertcontrols");
1385 if (invertControls != null)
1386 {
1387 switch (inputType)
1388 {
1389 case InputType.Left:
1390 inputType = InputType.Right;
1391 break;
1392 case InputType.Right:
1393 inputType = InputType.Left;
1394 break;
1395 case InputType.Up:
1396 inputType = InputType.Down;
1397 break;
1398 case InputType.Down:
1399 inputType = InputType.Up;
1400 break;
1401 }
1402 }
1403 }
1404
1405 return keys[(int)inputType].Held;
1406 }

1424 foreach (Key key in keys)

1427 key.Held = false;
1428 }

1446 public void GiveIdCardTags(WayPoint spawnPoint, bool createNetworkEvent = false)
1447 {
1448 if (info?.Job == null || spawnPoint == null) { return; }
1449
1450 foreach (Item item in Inventory.AllItems)
1451 {
1452 if (item?.Prefab.Identifier != "idcard") { continue; }
1453 foreach (string s in spawnPoint.IdCardTags)
1454 {
1455 item.AddTag(s);
1456 }
1457 if (createNetworkEvent && GameMain.NetworkMember is { IsServer: true })
1458 {
1459 GameMain.NetworkMember.CreateEntityEvent(item, new Item.ChangePropertyEventData(item.SerializableProperties[nameof(item.Tags).ToIdentifier()]));
1460 }
1461 }

1464 public float GetSkillLevel(string skillIdentifier) =>
1465 GetSkillLevel(skillIdentifier.ToIdentifier());
1466
1467 public float GetSkillLevel(Identifier skillIdentifier)
1468 {
1469 if (Info?.Job == null) { return 0.0f; }
1470 float skillLevel = Info.Job.GetSkillLevel(skillIdentifier);
1471
1472 // apply multipliers first so that multipliers only affect base skill value
1473 foreach (Affliction affliction in CharacterHealth.GetAllAfflictions())
1474 {
1475 skillLevel *= affliction.GetSkillMultiplier();
1476 }
1477
1478 if (skillIdentifier != null)
1479 {
1480 for (int i = 0; i < Inventory.Capacity; i++)
1481 {
1482 if (Inventory.SlotTypes[i] != InvSlotType.Any && Inventory.GetItemAt(i)?.GetComponent<Wearable>() is Wearable wearable)
1483 {
1484 if (wearable.SkillModifiers.TryGetValue(skillIdentifier, out float skillValue))
1485 {
1486 skillLevel += skillValue;
1487 }
1488 }
1489 }
1490 }
1491
1492 skillLevel += GetStatValue(GetSkillStatType(skillIdentifier));
1493
1494 return skillLevel;
1495 }

1497 // TODO: reposition? there's also the overrideTargetMovement variable, but it's not in the same manner
1498 public Vector2? OverrideMovement { get; set; }
1499 public bool ForceRun { get; set; }
1500
1501 public bool IsClimbing => AnimController.Anim == AnimController.Animation.Climbing;
1502
1503 public Vector2 GetTargetMovement()
1504 {
1505 Vector2 targetMovement = Vector2.Zero;
1506 if (OverrideMovement.HasValue)
1507 {
1508 targetMovement = OverrideMovement.Value;
1509 }
1510 else
1511 {
1512 if (IsKeyDown(InputType.Left)) { targetMovement.X -= 1.0f; }
1513 if (IsKeyDown(InputType.Right)) { targetMovement.X += 1.0f; }
1514 if (IsKeyDown(InputType.Up)) { targetMovement.Y += 1.0f; }
1515 if (IsKeyDown(InputType.Down)) { targetMovement.Y -= 1.0f; }
1516 }
1517 bool run = false;
1518 if ((IsKeyDown(InputType.Run) && AnimController.ForceSelectAnimationType == AnimationType.NotDefined) || ForceRun)
1519 {
1520
1521 run = CanRun;
1522 }
1523 return ApplyMovementLimits(targetMovement, AnimController.GetCurrentSpeed(run));
1524 }
1525
1526 //can't run if
1527 // - dragging someone
1528 // - crouching
1529 // - moving backwards
1530 public bool CanRun => (SelectedCharacter == null || !SelectedCharacter.CanBeDragged || HasAbilityFlag(AbilityFlags.MoveNormallyWhileDragging)) &&
1531 (!(AnimController is HumanoidAnimController) || !((HumanoidAnimController)AnimController).Crouching) &&
1532 !AnimController.IsMovingBackwards && !HasAbilityFlag(AbilityFlags.MustWalk);
1533
1534 public Vector2 ApplyMovementLimits(Vector2 targetMovement, float currentSpeed)
1535 {
1536 //the vertical component is only used for falling through platforms and climbing ladders when not in water,
1537 //so the movement can't be normalized or the Character would walk slower when pressing down/up
1538 if (AnimController.InWater)
1539 {
1540 float length = targetMovement.Length();
1541 if (length > 0.0f)
1542 {
1543 targetMovement /= length;
1544 }
1545 }
1546 targetMovement *= currentSpeed;
1547 float maxSpeed = ApplyTemporarySpeedLimits(currentSpeed);
1548 targetMovement.X = MathHelper.Clamp(targetMovement.X, -maxSpeed, maxSpeed);
1549 targetMovement.Y = MathHelper.Clamp(targetMovement.Y, -maxSpeed, maxSpeed);
1550 SpeedMultiplier = greatestPositiveSpeedMultiplier - (1f - greatestNegativeSpeedMultiplier);
1551 targetMovement *= SpeedMultiplier;
1552 // Reset, status effects will set the value before the next update
1553 ResetSpeedMultiplier();
1554 return targetMovement;
1555 }
1556
1557 private float greatestNegativeSpeedMultiplier = 1f;
1558 private float greatestPositiveSpeedMultiplier = 1f;
1559
1563 public float SpeedMultiplier { get; private set; } = 1;
1564
1565
1566 private double propulsionSpeedMultiplierLastSet;
1567 private float propulsionSpeedMultiplier;
1571 public float PropulsionSpeedMultiplier
1572 {
1573 get { return propulsionSpeedMultiplier; }
1574 set
1575 {
1576 propulsionSpeedMultiplier = value;
1577 propulsionSpeedMultiplierLastSet = Timing.TotalTime;
1578 }
1579 }
1580
1581 public void StackSpeedMultiplier(float val)
1582 {
1583 if (val < 1f)
1584 {
1585 if (val < greatestNegativeSpeedMultiplier)
1586 {
1587 greatestNegativeSpeedMultiplier = val;
1588 }
1589 }
1590 else
1591 {
1592 if (val > greatestPositiveSpeedMultiplier)
1593 {
1594 greatestPositiveSpeedMultiplier = val;
1595 }
1596 }
1597 }
1598
1599 public void ResetSpeedMultiplier()
1600 {
1601 greatestPositiveSpeedMultiplier = 1f;
1602 greatestNegativeSpeedMultiplier = 1f;
1603 if (Timing.TotalTime > propulsionSpeedMultiplierLastSet + 0.1)
1604 {
1605 propulsionSpeedMultiplier = 1.0f;
1606 }
1607 }

1609 private float greatestNegativeHealthMultiplier = 1f;
1610 private float greatestPositiveHealthMultiplier = 1f;
1611
1615 public float HealthMultiplier { get; private set; } = 1;
1616
1617 public void StackHealthMultiplier(float val)
1618 {
1619 if (val < 1f)
1620 {
1621 if (val < greatestNegativeHealthMultiplier)
1622 {
1623 greatestNegativeHealthMultiplier = val;
1624 }
1625 }
1626 else
1627 {
1628 if (val > greatestPositiveHealthMultiplier)
1629 {
1630 greatestPositiveHealthMultiplier = val;
1631 }
1632 }
1633 }
1634
1635 private void CalculateHealthMultiplier()
1636 {
1637 HealthMultiplier = greatestPositiveHealthMultiplier - (1f - greatestNegativeHealthMultiplier);
1638 // Reset, status effects should set the values again, if the conditions match
1639 greatestPositiveHealthMultiplier = 1f;
1640 greatestNegativeHealthMultiplier = 1f;
1641 }

1649 {
1650 StaticHealthMultiplier *= newMultiplier;

1656 public float GetTemporarySpeedReduction()
1657 {
1658 float reduction = 0;
1659 reduction = CalculateMovementPenalty(AnimController.GetLimb(LimbType.RightFoot, excludeSevered: false), reduction);
1660 reduction = CalculateMovementPenalty(AnimController.GetLimb(LimbType.LeftFoot, excludeSevered: false), reduction);
1661 if (AnimController is HumanoidAnimController)
1662 {
1663 if (AnimController.InWater)
1664 {
1665 // Currently only humans use hands for swimming.
1666 reduction = CalculateMovementPenalty(AnimController.GetLimb(LimbType.RightHand, excludeSevered: false), reduction);
1667 reduction = CalculateMovementPenalty(AnimController.GetLimb(LimbType.LeftHand, excludeSevered: false), reduction);
1668 }
1669 }
1670 else
1671 {
1672 int totalTailLimbs = 0;
1673 int destroyedTailLimbs = 0;
1674 foreach (var limb in AnimController.Limbs)
1675 {
1676 if (limb.type == LimbType.Tail)
1677 {
1678 totalTailLimbs++;
1679 if (limb.IsSevered)
1680 {
1681 destroyedTailLimbs++;
1682 }
1683 }
1684 }
1685 if (destroyedTailLimbs > 0)
1686 {
1687 reduction += MathHelper.Lerp(0, AnimController.InWater ? 1f : 0.5f, (float)destroyedTailLimbs / totalTailLimbs);
1688 }
1689 }
1690 return Math.Clamp(reduction, 0, 1f);
1691 }
1692
1693 private float CalculateMovementPenalty(Limb limb, float sum, float max = 0.8f)
1694 {
1695 if (limb != null)
1696 {
1697 sum += MathHelper.Lerp(0, max, CharacterHealth.GetLimbDamage(limb, afflictionType: "damage"));
1698 }
1699 return Math.Clamp(sum, 0, 1f);
1700 }
1701
1702 public float GetRightHandPenalty() => CalculateMovementPenalty(AnimController.GetLimb(LimbType.RightHand, excludeSevered: false), 0, max: 1);
1703 public float GetLeftHandPenalty() => CalculateMovementPenalty(AnimController.GetLimb(LimbType.LeftHand, excludeSevered: false), 0, max: 1);
1704
1705 public float GetLegPenalty(float startSum = 0)
1706 {
1707 float sum = startSum;
1708 foreach (var limb in AnimController.Limbs)
1709 {
1710 switch (limb.type)
1711 {
1712 case LimbType.RightFoot:
1713 case LimbType.LeftFoot:
1714 sum += CalculateMovementPenalty(limb, sum, max: 0.5f);
1715 break;
1716 }
1717 }
1718 return Math.Clamp(sum, 0, 1f);
1719 }
1720
1721 public float ApplyTemporarySpeedLimits(float speed)
1722 {
1723 float max;
1724 if (AnimController is HumanoidAnimController)
1725 {
1726 max = AnimController.InWater ? 0.5f : 0.8f;
1727 }
1728 else
1729 {
1730 max = AnimController.InWater ? 0.9f : 0.5f;
1731 }
1732 speed *= 1f - MathHelper.Lerp(0, max, GetTemporarySpeedReduction());
1733 return speed;
1734 }

1736 public void Control(float deltaTime, Camera cam)
1737 {
1738 ViewTarget = null;
1739 if (!AllowInput) { return; }
1740
1741 if (Controlled == this || (GameMain.NetworkMember != null && GameMain.NetworkMember.IsServer))
1742 {
1743 SmoothedCursorPosition = cursorPosition;
1744 }
1745 else
1746 {
1747 //apply some smoothing to the cursor positions of remote players when playing as a client
1748 //to make aiming look a little less choppy
1749 Vector2 smoothedCursorDiff = cursorPosition - SmoothedCursorPosition;
1750 smoothedCursorDiff = NetConfig.InterpolateCursorPositionError(smoothedCursorDiff);
1751 SmoothedCursorPosition = cursorPosition - smoothedCursorDiff;
1752 }
1753
1754 bool aiControlled = this is AICharacter && Controlled != this && !IsRemotelyControlled;
1755 if (!aiControlled)
1756 {
1757 Vector2 targetMovement = GetTargetMovement();
1758 AnimController.TargetMovement = targetMovement;
1759 AnimController.IgnorePlatforms = AnimController.TargetMovement.Y < -0.1f;
1760 }
1761
1762 if (AnimController is HumanoidAnimController humanAnimController)
1763 {
1764 humanAnimController.Crouching = humanAnimController.ForceSelectAnimationType == AnimationType.Crouch || IsKeyDown(InputType.Crouch);
1765 }
1766
1767 if (!aiControlled &&
1768 AnimController.Anim != AnimController.Animation.UsingConstruction &&
1769 AnimController.Anim != AnimController.Animation.CPR &&
1770 (GameMain.NetworkMember == null || !GameMain.NetworkMember.IsClient || Controlled == this) &&
1771 AnimController.OnGround && !AnimController.InWater)
1772 {
1773 if (dontFollowCursor)
1774 {
1775 AnimController.TargetDir = Direction.Right;
1776 }
1777 else
1778 {
1779 // Values lower than this seem to cause constantious flipping when the mouse is near the player and the player is running, because the root collider moves after flipping.
1780 float followMargin = 40;
1781 if (CursorPosition.X < AnimController.Collider.Position.X - followMargin)
1782 {
1783 AnimController.TargetDir = Direction.Left;
1784 }
1785 else if (CursorPosition.X > AnimController.Collider.Position.X + followMargin)
1786 {
1787 AnimController.TargetDir = Direction.Right;
1788 }
1789 }
1790 }
1791
1792 if (GameMain.NetworkMember != null)
1793 {
1794 if (GameMain.NetworkMember.IsServer)
1795 {
1796 if (!aiControlled)
1797 {
1798 if (dequeuedInput.HasFlag(InputNetFlags.FacingLeft))
1799 {
1800 AnimController.TargetDir = Direction.Left;
1801 }
1802 else
1803 {
1804 AnimController.TargetDir = Direction.Right;
1805 }
1806 }
1807 }
1808 else if (GameMain.NetworkMember.IsClient && Controlled != this)
1809 {
1810 if (memState.Count > 0)
1811 {
1812 AnimController.TargetDir = memState[0].Direction;
1813 }
1814 }
1815 }
1816
1817#if DEBUG && CLIENT
1818 if (PlayerInput.KeyHit(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Input.Keys.F))
1819 {
1820 AnimController.ReleaseStuckLimbs();
1821 if (AIController != null && AIController is EnemyAIController enemyAI)
1822 {
1823 enemyAI.LatchOntoAI?.DeattachFromBody(reset: true);
1824 }
1825 }
1826#endif
1827 if (attackCoolDown > 0.0f)
1828 {
1829 attackCoolDown -= deltaTime;
1830 }
1831 else if (IsKeyDown(InputType.Attack))
1832 {
1833 if (GameMain.NetworkMember != null && GameMain.NetworkMember.IsClient && Controlled != this)
1834 {
1835 if ((currentAttackTarget.DamageTarget as Entity)?.Removed ?? false)
1836 {
1837 currentAttackTarget = default(AttackTargetData);
1838 }
1839 currentAttackTarget.AttackLimb?.UpdateAttack(deltaTime, currentAttackTarget.AttackPos, currentAttackTarget.DamageTarget, out _);
1840 }
1841 else if (IsPlayer)
1842 {
1843 float dist = -1;
1844 Vector2 attackPos = SimPosition + ConvertUnits.ToSimUnits(cursorPosition - Position);
1845 List<Body> ignoredBodies = AnimController.Limbs.Select(l => l.body.FarseerBody).ToList();
1846 ignoredBodies.Add(AnimController.Collider.FarseerBody);
1847
1848 var body = Submarine.PickBody(
1849 SimPosition,
1850 attackPos,
1851 ignoredBodies,
1852 Physics.CollisionCharacter | Physics.CollisionWall);
1853
1854 IDamageable attackTarget = null;
1855 if (body != null)
1856 {
1857 attackPos = Submarine.LastPickedPosition;
1858
1859 if (body.UserData is Submarine sub)
1860 {
1861 body = Submarine.PickBody(
1862 SimPosition - ((Submarine)body.UserData).SimPosition,
1863 attackPos - ((Submarine)body.UserData).SimPosition,
1864 ignoredBodies,
1865 Physics.CollisionWall);
1866
1867 if (body != null)
1868 {
1869 attackPos = Submarine.LastPickedPosition + sub.SimPosition;
1870 attackTarget = body.UserData as IDamageable;
1871 }
1872 }
1873 else
1874 {
1875 if (body.UserData is IDamageable damageable)
1876 {
1877 attackTarget = damageable;
1878 }
1879 else if (body.UserData is Limb limb)
1880 {
1881 attackTarget = limb.character;
1882 }
1883 }
1884 }
1885 var currentContexts = GetAttackContexts();
1886 var validLimbs = AnimController.Limbs.Where(l =>
1887 {
1888 if (l.IsSevered || l.IsStuck) { return false; }
1889 if (l.Disabled) { return false; }
1890 var attack = l.attack;
1891 if (attack == null) { return false; }
1892 if (attack.CoolDownTimer > 0) { return false; }
1893 if (!attack.IsValidContext(currentContexts)) { return false; }
1894 if (attackTarget != null)
1895 {
1896 if (!attack.IsValidTarget(attackTarget as Entity)) { return false; }
1897 if (attackTarget is ISerializableEntity se && attackTarget is Character)
1898 {
1899 if (attack.Conditionals.Any(c => !c.TargetSelf && !c.Matches(se))) { return false; }
1900 }
1901 }
1902 if (attack.Conditionals.Any(c => c.TargetSelf && !c.Matches(this))) { return false; }
1903 return true;
1904 });
1905 var sortedLimbs = validLimbs.OrderBy(l => Vector2.DistanceSquared(ConvertUnits.ToDisplayUnits(l.SimPosition), cursorPosition));
1906 // Select closest
1907 var attackLimb = sortedLimbs.FirstOrDefault();
1908 if (attackLimb != null)
1909 {
1910 if (attackTarget is Character targetCharacter)
1911 {
1912 dist = ConvertUnits.ToDisplayUnits(Vector2.Distance(Submarine.LastPickedPosition, attackLimb.SimPosition));
1913 foreach (Limb limb in targetCharacter.AnimController.Limbs)
1914 {
1915 if (limb.IsSevered || limb.Removed) { continue; }
1916 float tempDist = ConvertUnits.ToDisplayUnits(Vector2.Distance(limb.SimPosition, attackLimb.SimPosition));
1917 if (tempDist < dist)
1918 {
1919 dist = tempDist;
1920 }
1921 }
1922 }
1923 attackLimb.UpdateAttack(deltaTime, attackPos, attackTarget, out AttackResult attackResult, dist);
1924 if (!attackLimb.attack.IsRunning)
1925 {
1926 attackCoolDown = 1.0f;
1927 }
1928 }
1929 }
1930 }
1931
1932 if (SelectedConstruction == null || !SelectedConstruction.Prefab.DisableItemUsageWhenSelected)
1933 {
1934 foreach (Item item in HeldItems)
1935 {
1936 if (IsKeyDown(InputType.Aim) || !item.RequireAimToSecondaryUse)
1937 {
1938 item.SecondaryUse(deltaTime, this);
1939 }
1940 if (IsKeyDown(InputType.Use) && !item.IsShootable)
1941 {
1942 if (!item.RequireAimToUse || IsKeyDown(InputType.Aim))
1943 {
1944 item.Use(deltaTime, this);
1945 }
1946 }
1947 if (IsKeyDown(InputType.Shoot) && item.IsShootable)
1948 {
1949 if (!item.RequireAimToUse || IsKeyDown(InputType.Aim))
1950 {
1951 item.Use(deltaTime, this);
1952 }
1953#if CLIENT
1954 else if (item.RequireAimToUse && !IsKeyDown(InputType.Aim))
1955 {
1956 HintManager.OnShootWithoutAiming(this, item);
1957 }
1958#endif
1959 }
1960 }
1961 }
1962
1963 if (SelectedConstruction != null)
1964 {
1965 if (IsKeyDown(InputType.Aim) || !SelectedConstruction.RequireAimToSecondaryUse)
1966 {
1967 SelectedConstruction.SecondaryUse(deltaTime, this);
1968 }
1969 if (IsKeyDown(InputType.Use) && SelectedConstruction != null && !SelectedConstruction.IsShootable)
1970 {
1971 if (!SelectedConstruction.RequireAimToUse || IsKeyDown(InputType.Aim))
1972 {
1973 SelectedConstruction.Use(deltaTime, this);
1974 }
1975 }
1976 if (IsKeyDown(InputType.Shoot) && SelectedConstruction != null && SelectedConstruction.IsShootable)
1977 {
1978 if (!SelectedConstruction.RequireAimToUse || IsKeyDown(InputType.Aim))
1979 {
1980 SelectedConstruction.Use(deltaTime, this);
1981 }
1982 }
1983 }
1984
1985 if (SelectedCharacter != null)
1986 {
1987 if (Vector2.DistanceSquared(SelectedCharacter.WorldPosition, WorldPosition) > 90000.0f || !SelectedCharacter.CanBeSelected)
1988 {
1989 DeselectCharacter();
1990 }
1991 }
1992
1993 if (IsRemotelyControlled && keys != null)
1994 {
1995 foreach (Key key in keys)
1996 {
1997 key.ResetHit();
1998 }
1999 }

2020 public bool CanSeeCharacter(Character target)
2021 {
2022 System.Diagnostics.Debug.Assert(target != null);
2023 if (target == null) { return false; }
2024 if (target.Removed) { return false; }
2025 Limb seeingLimb = GetSeeingLimb();
2026 if (CanSeeTarget(target, seeingLimb)) { return true; }
2027 if (!target.AnimController.SimplePhysicsEnabled)
2028 {
2029 //find the limbs that are furthest from the target's position (from the viewer's point of view)
2030 Limb leftExtremity = null, rightExtremity = null;
2031 float leftMostDot = 0.0f, rightMostDot = 0.0f;
2032 Vector2 dir = target.WorldPosition - WorldPosition;
2033 Vector2 leftDir = new Vector2(dir.Y, -dir.X);
2034 Vector2 rightDir = new Vector2(-dir.Y, dir.X);
2035 foreach (Limb limb in target.AnimController.Limbs)
2036 {
2037 if (limb.IsSevered || limb == target.AnimController.MainLimb) { continue; }
2038 if (limb.Hidden) { continue; }
2039 Vector2 limbDir = limb.WorldPosition - WorldPosition;
2040 float leftDot = Vector2.Dot(limbDir, leftDir);
2041 if (leftDot > leftMostDot)
2042 {
2043 leftMostDot = leftDot;
2044 leftExtremity = limb;
2045 continue;
2046 }
2047 float rightDot = Vector2.Dot(limbDir, rightDir);
2048 if (rightDot > rightMostDot)
2049 {
2050 rightMostDot = rightDot;
2051 rightExtremity = limb;
2052 continue;
2053 }
2054 }
2055 if (leftExtremity != null && CanSeeTarget(leftExtremity, seeingLimb)) { return true; }
2056 if (rightExtremity != null && CanSeeTarget(rightExtremity, seeingLimb)) { return true; }
2057 }
2058 return false;
2059 }
2060
2061 private Limb GetSeeingLimb()
2062 {
2063 return AnimController.GetLimb(LimbType.Head) ?? AnimController.GetLimb(LimbType.Torso) ?? AnimController.MainLimb;
2064 }
2065
2066 public bool CanSeeTarget(ISpatialEntity target, ISpatialEntity seeingEntity = null)
2067 {
2068 System.Diagnostics.Debug.Assert(target != null);
2069 if (target == null) { return false; }
2070 seeingEntity ??= AnimController.SimplePhysicsEnabled ? this : GetSeeingLimb() as ISpatialEntity;
2071 if (seeingEntity == null) { return false; }
2072 ISpatialEntity sourceEntity = seeingEntity ;
2073 // TODO: Could we just use the method below? If not, let's refactor it so that we can.
2074 Vector2 diff = ConvertUnits.ToSimUnits(target.WorldPosition - sourceEntity.WorldPosition);
2075 Body closestBody;
2076 //both inside the same sub (or both outside)
2077 //OR the we're inside, the other character outside
2078 if (target.Submarine == Submarine || target.Submarine == null)
2079 {
2080 closestBody = Submarine.CheckVisibility(sourceEntity.SimPosition, sourceEntity.SimPosition + diff);
2081 }
2082 //we're outside, the other character inside
2083 else if (Submarine == null)
2084 {
2085 closestBody = Submarine.CheckVisibility(target.SimPosition, target.SimPosition - diff);
2086 }
2087 //both inside different subs
2088 else
2089 {
2090 closestBody = Submarine.CheckVisibility(sourceEntity.SimPosition, sourceEntity.SimPosition + diff);
2091 if (!IsBlocking(closestBody))
2092 {
2093 closestBody = Submarine.CheckVisibility(target.SimPosition, target.SimPosition - diff);
2094 }
2095 }
2096 return !IsBlocking(closestBody);
2097
2098 bool IsBlocking(Body body)
2099 {
2100 if (body == null) { return false; }
2101 if (body.UserData is Structure wall && wall.CastShadow)
2102 {
2103 return wall != target;
2104 }
2105 else if (body.UserData is Item item)
2106 {
2107 return item != target;
2108 }
2109 return true;
2110 }
2111 }

2120 public bool HasEquippedItem(Item item, InvSlotType? slotType = null, Func<InvSlotType, bool> predicate = null)
2121 {
2122 if (Inventory == null) { return false; }
2123 for (int i = 0; i < Inventory.Capacity; i++)
2124 {
2125 InvSlotType slot = Inventory.SlotTypes[i];
2126 if (predicate != null)
2127 {
2128 if (!predicate(slot)) { continue; }
2129 }
2130 if (slotType.HasValue)
2131 {
2132 if (!slotType.Value.HasFlag(slot)) { continue; }
2133 }
2134 else if (slot == InvSlotType.Any)
2135 {
2136 continue;
2137 }
2138 if (Inventory.GetItemAt(i) == item) { return true; }
2139 }
2140 return false;
2141 }

2150 {

2160 if (item == null) { continue; }
2161 if (!allowBroken && item.Condition <= 0.0f) { continue; }

2163 }

2187 public bool CanAccessInventory(Inventory inventory)
2188 {
2189 if (!CanInteract || inventory.Locked) { return false; }
2190
2191 //the inventory belongs to some other character
2192 if (inventory.Owner is Character character && inventory.Owner != this)
2193 {
2194 var owner = character;
2195 //can only be accessed if the character is incapacitated and has been selected
2196 return SelectedCharacter == owner && owner.CanInventoryBeAccessed;
2197 }
2198
2199 if (inventory.Owner is Item item)
2200 {
2201 if (!CanInteractWith(item) && !item.linkedTo.Any(lt => lt is Item item && item.DisplaySideBySideWhenLinked && CanInteractWith(item))) { return false; }
2202 ItemContainer container = item.GetComponents<ItemContainer>().FirstOrDefault(ic => ic.Inventory == inventory);
2203 if (container != null && !container.HasRequiredItems(this, addMessage: false)) { return false; }
2204 }
2205 return true;
2206 }
2207
2208 private float _selectedItemPriority;
2209 private Item _foundItem;
2217 public bool FindItem(ref int itemIndex, out Item targetItem, IEnumerable<Identifier> identifiers = null, bool ignoreBroken = true,
2218 IEnumerable<Item> ignoredItems = null, IEnumerable<Identifier> ignoredContainerIdentifiers = null,
2219 Func<Item, bool> customPredicate = null, Func<Item, float> customPriorityFunction = null, float maxItemDistance = 10000, ISpatialEntity positionalReference = null)
2220 {
2221 if (itemIndex == 0)
2222 {
2223 _foundItem = null;
2224 _selectedItemPriority = 0;
2225 }
2226 for (int i = 0; i < 10 && itemIndex < Item.ItemList.Count - 1; i++)
2227 {
2228 itemIndex++;
2229 var item = Item.ItemList[itemIndex];
2230 if (!item.IsInteractable(this)) { continue; }
2231 if (ignoredItems != null && ignoredItems.Contains(item)) { continue; }
2232 if (item.Submarine == null) { continue; }
2233 if (item.Submarine.TeamID != TeamID) { continue; }
2234 if (item.CurrentHull == null) { continue; }
2235 if (ignoreBroken && item.Condition <= 0) { continue; }
2236 if (Submarine != null)
2237 {
2238 if (!Submarine.IsEntityFoundOnThisSub(item, true)) { continue; }
2239 }
2240 if (customPredicate != null && !customPredicate(item)) { continue; }
2241 if (identifiers != null && identifiers.None(id => item.Prefab.Identifier == id || item.HasTag(id))) { continue; }
2242 if (ignoredContainerIdentifiers != null && item.Container != null)
2243 {
2244 if (ignoredContainerIdentifiers.Contains(item.ContainerIdentifier)) { continue; }
2245 }
2246 if (IsItemTakenBySomeoneElse(item)) { continue; }
2247 Entity rootInventoryOwner = item.GetRootInventoryOwner();
2248 if (rootInventoryOwner is Item ownerItem)
2249 {
2250 if (!ownerItem.IsInteractable(this)) { continue; }
2251 }
2252 float itemPriority = customPriorityFunction != null ? customPriorityFunction(item) : 1;
2253 if (itemPriority <= 0) { continue; }
2254 Vector2 itemPos = (rootInventoryOwner ?? item).WorldPosition;
2255 Vector2 refPos = positionalReference != null ? positionalReference.WorldPosition : WorldPosition;
2256 float yDist = Math.Abs(refPos.Y - itemPos.Y);
2257 yDist = yDist > 100 ? yDist * 5 : 0;
2258 float dist = Math.Abs(refPos.X - itemPos.X) + yDist;
2259 float distanceFactor = MathHelper.Lerp(1, 0, MathUtils.InverseLerp(0, maxItemDistance, dist));
2260 itemPriority *= distanceFactor;
2261 if (itemPriority > _selectedItemPriority)
2262 {
2263 _selectedItemPriority = itemPriority;
2264 _foundItem = item;
2265 }
2266 }
2267 targetItem = _foundItem;
2268 return itemIndex >= Item.ItemList.Count - 1;
2269 }
2270
2271 public bool IsItemTakenBySomeoneElse(Item item) => item.FindParentInventory(i => i.Owner != this && i.Owner is Character owner && !owner.IsDead && !owner.Removed) != null;
2272
2273 public bool CanInteractWith(Character c, float maxDist = 200.0f, bool checkVisibility = true, bool skipDistanceCheck = false)
2274 {
2275 if (c == this || Removed || !c.Enabled || !c.CanBeSelected || c.InvisibleTimer > 0.0f) { return false; }
2276 if (!c.CharacterHealth.UseHealthWindow && !c.CanBeDragged && (c.onCustomInteract == null || !c.AllowCustomInteract)) { return false; }
2277
2278 if (!skipDistanceCheck)
2279 {
2280 maxDist = ConvertUnits.ToSimUnits(maxDist);
2281 if (Vector2.DistanceSquared(SimPosition, c.SimPosition) > maxDist * maxDist) { return false; }
2282 }
2283
2284 return checkVisibility ? CanSeeCharacter(c) : true;
2285 }
2286
2287 public bool CanInteractWith(Item item, bool checkLinked = true)
2288 {
2289 return CanInteractWith(item, out _, checkLinked);
2290 }
2291
2292 public bool CanInteractWith(Item item, out float distanceToItem, bool checkLinked)
2293 {
2294 distanceToItem = -1.0f;
2295
2296 bool hidden = item.HiddenInGame;
2297#if CLIENT
2298 if (Screen.Selected == GameMain.SubEditorScreen) { hidden = false; }
2299#endif
2300 if (!CanInteract || hidden || !item.IsInteractable(this)) { return false; }
2301
2302 if (item.ParentInventory != null)
2303 {
2304 return CanAccessInventory(item.ParentInventory);
2305 }
2306
2307 Wire wire = item.GetComponent<Wire>();
2308 if (wire != null && item.GetComponent<ConnectionPanel>() == null)
2309 {
2310 //locked wires are never interactable
2311 if (wire.Locked) { return false; }
2312 if (wire.HiddenInGame && Screen.Selected == GameMain.GameScreen) { return false; }
2313
2314 //wires are interactable if the character has selected an item the wire is connected to,
2315 //and it's disconnected from the other end
2316 if (wire.Connections[0]?.Item != null && SelectedConstruction == wire.Connections[0].Item)
2317 {
2318 return wire.Connections[1] == null;
2319 }
2320 if (wire.Connections[1]?.Item != null && SelectedConstruction == wire.Connections[1].Item)
2321 {
2322 return wire.Connections[0] == null;
2323 }
2324 if (SelectedConstruction?.GetComponent<ConnectionPanel>()?.DisconnectedWires.Contains(wire) ?? false)
2325 {
2326 return wire.Connections[0] == null && wire.Connections[1] == null;
2327 }
2328 }
2329
2330 if (checkLinked && item.DisplaySideBySideWhenLinked)
2331 {
2332 foreach (MapEntity linked in item.linkedTo)
2333 {
2334 if (linked is Item linkedItem)
2335 {
2336 if (CanInteractWith(linkedItem, out float distToLinked, checkLinked: false))
2337 {
2338 distanceToItem = distToLinked;
2339 return true;
2340 }
2341 }
2342 }
2343 }
2344
2345 if (item.InteractDistance == 0.0f && !item.Prefab.Triggers.Any()) { return false; }
2346
2347 Pickable pickableComponent = item.GetComponent<Pickable>();
2348 if (pickableComponent != null && pickableComponent.Picker != this && pickableComponent.Picker != null && !pickableComponent.Picker.IsDead) { return false; }
2349
2350 if (SelectedConstruction?.GetComponent<RemoteController>()?.TargetItem == item) { return true; }
2351 //optimization: don't use HeldItems because it allocates memory and this method is executed very frequently
2352 var heldItem1 = Inventory?.GetItemInLimbSlot(InvSlotType.RightHand);
2353 if (heldItem1?.GetComponent<RemoteController>()?.TargetItem == item) { return true; }
2354 var heldItem2 = Inventory?.GetItemInLimbSlot(InvSlotType.LeftHand);
2355 if (heldItem2?.GetComponent<RemoteController>()?.TargetItem == item) { return true; }
2356
2357 Vector2 characterDirection = Vector2.Transform(Vector2.UnitY, Matrix.CreateRotationZ(AnimController.Collider.Rotation));
2358
2359 Vector2 upperBodyPosition = Position + (characterDirection * 20.0f);
2360 Vector2 lowerBodyPosition = Position - (characterDirection * 60.0f);
2361
2362 if (Submarine != null)
2363 {
2364 upperBodyPosition += Submarine.Position;
2365 lowerBodyPosition += Submarine.Position;
2366 }
2367
2368 bool insideTrigger = item.IsInsideTrigger(upperBodyPosition) || item.IsInsideTrigger(lowerBodyPosition);
2369 if (item.Prefab.Triggers.Length > 0 && !insideTrigger && item.Prefab.RequireBodyInsideTrigger) { return false; }
2370
2371 Rectangle itemDisplayRect = new Rectangle(item.InteractionRect.X, item.InteractionRect.Y - item.InteractionRect.Height, item.InteractionRect.Width, item.InteractionRect.Height);
2372
2373 // Get the point along the line between lowerBodyPosition and upperBodyPosition which is closest to the center of itemDisplayRect
2374 Vector2 playerDistanceCheckPosition =
2375 lowerBodyPosition.Y < upperBodyPosition.Y ?
2376 Vector2.Clamp(itemDisplayRect.Center.ToVector2(), lowerBodyPosition, upperBodyPosition) :
2377 Vector2.Clamp(itemDisplayRect.Center.ToVector2(), upperBodyPosition, lowerBodyPosition);
2378
2379 // If playerDistanceCheckPosition is inside the itemDisplayRect then we consider the character to within 0 distance of the item
2380 if (itemDisplayRect.Contains(playerDistanceCheckPosition))
2381 {
2382 distanceToItem = 0.0f;
2383 }
2384 else
2385 {
2386 // Here we get the point on the itemDisplayRect which is closest to playerDistanceCheckPosition
2387 Vector2 rectIntersectionPoint = new Vector2(
2388 MathHelper.Clamp(playerDistanceCheckPosition.X, itemDisplayRect.X, itemDisplayRect.Right),
2389 MathHelper.Clamp(playerDistanceCheckPosition.Y, itemDisplayRect.Y, itemDisplayRect.Bottom));
2390 distanceToItem = Vector2.Distance(rectIntersectionPoint, playerDistanceCheckPosition);
2391 }
2392
2393 if (distanceToItem > item.InteractDistance && item.InteractDistance > 0.0f) { return false; }
2394
2395 if (!item.Prefab.InteractThroughWalls && Screen.Selected != GameMain.SubEditorScreen && !insideTrigger)
2396 {
2397 Vector2 itemPosition = item.SimPosition;
2398 if (Submarine == null && item.Submarine != null)
2399 {
2400 //character is outside, item inside
2401 itemPosition += item.Submarine.SimPosition;
2402 }
2403 else if (Submarine != null && item.Submarine == null)
2404 {
2405 //character is inside, item outside
2406 itemPosition -= Submarine.SimPosition;
2407 }
2408 else if (Submarine != item.Submarine)
2409 {
2410 //character and the item are inside different subs
2411 itemPosition += item.Submarine.SimPosition;
2412 itemPosition -= Submarine.SimPosition;
2413 }
2414 var body = Submarine.CheckVisibility(SimPosition, itemPosition, ignoreLevel: true);
2415 if (body != null && body.UserData as Item != item && (body.UserData as ItemComponent)?.Item != item && Submarine.LastPickedFixture?.UserData as Item != item)
2416 {
2417 return false;
2418 }
2419 }
2420
2421 return true;
2422 }

2429 public void SetCustomInteract(Action<Character, Character> onCustomInteract, LocalizedString hudText)
2430 {
2431 this.onCustomInteract = onCustomInteract;
2432 CustomInteractHUDText = hudText;
2433 }

2435 private void TransformCursorPos()
2436 {
2437 if (Submarine == null)
2438 {
2439 //character is outside but cursor position inside
2440 if (cursorPosition.Y > Level.Loaded.Size.Y)
2441 {
2442 var sub = Submarine.FindContaining(cursorPosition);
2443 if (sub != null) cursorPosition += sub.Position;
2444 }
2445 }
2446 else
2447 {
2448 //character is inside but cursor position is outside
2449 if (cursorPosition.Y < Level.Loaded.Size.Y)
2450 {
2451 cursorPosition -= Submarine.Position;
2452 }
2453 }

2466 SelectedCharacter = null;

2469 public void DoInteractionUpdate(float deltaTime, Vector2 mouseSimPos)
2470 {
2471 bool isLocalPlayer = Controlled == this;
2472
2473 if (!isLocalPlayer && (this is AICharacter && !IsRemotePlayer))
2474 {
2475 return;
2476 }
2477
2478 if (ResetInteract)
2479 {
2480 ResetInteract = false;
2481 return;
2482 }
2483
2484 if (!CanInteract)
2485 {
2486 SelectedConstruction = null;
2487 focusedItem = null;
2488 if (!AllowInput)
2489 {
2490 FocusedCharacter = null;
2491 if (SelectedCharacter != null) DeselectCharacter();
2492 return;
2493 }
2494 }
2495
2496#if CLIENT
2497 if (isLocalPlayer)
2498 {
2499 if (!IsMouseOnUI && (ViewTarget == null || ViewTarget == this))
2500 {
2501 if ((findFocusedTimer <= 0.0f || Screen.Selected == GameMain.SubEditorScreen) && (!PlayerInput.PrimaryMouseButtonHeld() || Barotrauma.Inventory.DraggingItemToWorld))
2502 {
2503 FocusedCharacter = CanInteract || CanEat ? FindCharacterAtPosition(mouseSimPos) : null;
2504 if (FocusedCharacter != null && !CanSeeCharacter(FocusedCharacter)) { FocusedCharacter = null; }
2505 float aimAssist = GameSettings.CurrentConfig.AimAssistAmount * (AnimController.InWater ? 1.5f : 1.0f);
2506 if (HeldItems.Any(it => it?.GetComponent<Wire>()?.IsActive ?? false))
2507 {
2508 //disable aim assist when rewiring to make it harder to accidentally select items when adding wire nodes
2509 aimAssist = 0.0f;
2510 }
2511
2512 var item = FindItemAtPosition(mouseSimPos, aimAssist);
2513
2514 focusedItem = CanInteract ? item : null;
2515 if (focusedItem != null && focusedItem.CampaignInteractionType != CampaignMode.InteractionType.None)
2516 {
2517 FocusedCharacter = null;
2518 }
2519 findFocusedTimer = 0.05f;
2520 }
2521 }
2522 else
2523 {
2524 FocusedCharacter = null;
2525 focusedItem = null;
2526 }
2527 findFocusedTimer -= deltaTime;
2528 }
2529#endif
2530 var head = AnimController.GetLimb(LimbType.Head);
2531 bool headInWater = head == null ?
2532 AnimController.InWater :
2533 head.InWater;
2534 //climb ladders automatically when pressing up/down inside their trigger area
2535 Ladder currentLadder = SelectedConstruction?.GetComponent<Ladder>();
2536 if ((SelectedConstruction == null || currentLadder != null) &&
2537 !headInWater && Screen.Selected != GameMain.SubEditorScreen)
2538 {
2539 bool climbInput = IsKeyDown(InputType.Up) || IsKeyDown(InputType.Down);
2540 bool isControlled = Controlled == this;
2541
2542 Ladder nearbyLadder = null;
2543 if (isControlled || climbInput)
2544 {
2545 float minDist = float.PositiveInfinity;
2546 foreach (Ladder ladder in Ladder.List)
2547 {
2548 if (ladder == currentLadder)
2549 {
2550 continue;
2551 }
2552 else if (currentLadder != null)
2553 {
2554 //only switch from ladder to another if the ladders are above the current ladders and pressing up, or vice versa
2555 if (ladder.Item.WorldPosition.Y > currentLadder.Item.WorldPosition.Y != IsKeyDown(InputType.Up))
2556 {
2557 continue;
2558 }
2559 }
2560
2561 if (CanInteractWith(ladder.Item, out float dist, checkLinked: false) && dist < minDist)
2562 {
2563 minDist = dist;
2564 nearbyLadder = ladder;
2565 if (isControlled)
2566 {
2567 ladder.Item.IsHighlighted = true;
2568 }
2569 break;
2570 }
2571 }
2572 }
2573
2574 if (nearbyLadder != null && climbInput)
2575 {
2576 if (nearbyLadder.Select(this))
2577 {
2578 SelectedConstruction = nearbyLadder.Item;
2579 }
2580 }
2581 }
2582
2583 if (SelectedCharacter != null && (IsKeyHit(InputType.Grab) || IsKeyHit(InputType.Health))) //Let people use ladders and buttons and stuff when dragging chars
2584 {
2585 DeselectCharacter();
2586 }
2587 else if (FocusedCharacter != null && IsKeyHit(InputType.Grab) && FocusedCharacter.CanBeDragged && (CanInteract || FocusedCharacter.IsDead && CanEat))
2588 {
2589 SelectCharacter(FocusedCharacter);
2590 }
2591 else if (FocusedCharacter != null && !FocusedCharacter.IsIncapacitated && IsKeyHit(InputType.Use) && FocusedCharacter.IsPet && CanInteract)
2592 {
2593 (FocusedCharacter.AIController as EnemyAIController).PetBehavior.Play(this);
2594 }
2595 else if (FocusedCharacter != null && IsKeyHit(InputType.Health) && FocusedCharacter.CharacterHealth.UseHealthWindow && CanInteract && CanInteractWith(FocusedCharacter, 160f, false))
2596 {
2597 if (FocusedCharacter == SelectedCharacter)
2598 {
2599 DeselectCharacter();
2600#if CLIENT
2601 if (Controlled == this)
2602 {
2603 CharacterHealth.OpenHealthWindow = null;
2604 }
2605#endif
2606 }
2607 else
2608 {
2609 SelectCharacter(FocusedCharacter);
2610#if CLIENT
2611 if (Controlled == this)
2612 {
2613 CharacterHealth.OpenHealthWindow = FocusedCharacter.CharacterHealth;
2614 }
2615#endif
2616 }
2617 }
2618 else if (FocusedCharacter != null && IsKeyHit(InputType.Use) && FocusedCharacter.onCustomInteract != null && FocusedCharacter.AllowCustomInteract)
2619 {
2620 FocusedCharacter.onCustomInteract(FocusedCharacter, this);
2621 }
2622 else if (IsKeyHit(InputType.Deselect) && SelectedConstruction != null && SelectedConstruction.GetComponent<Ladder>() == null)
2623 {
2624 SelectedConstruction = null;
2625#if CLIENT
2626 CharacterHealth.OpenHealthWindow = null;
2627#endif
2628 }
2629 else if (IsKeyHit(InputType.Health) && SelectedConstruction != null && SelectedConstruction.GetComponent<Ladder>() == null)
2630 {
2631 SelectedConstruction = null;
2632 }
2633 else if (focusedItem != null)
2634 {
2635#if CLIENT
2636 if (CharacterInventory.DraggingItemToWorld) { return; }
2637#endif
2638 bool canInteract = focusedItem.TryInteract(this);
2639#if CLIENT
2640 if (Controlled == this)
2641 {
2642 focusedItem.IsHighlighted = true;
2643 if (canInteract)
2644 {
2645 CharacterHealth.OpenHealthWindow = null;
2646 }
2647 }
2648#endif
2649 }
2650 }

2652 public static void UpdateAnimAll(float deltaTime)
2653 {
2654 foreach (Character c in CharacterList)
2655 {
2656 if (!c.Enabled || c.AnimController.Frozen) continue;
2657
2658 c.AnimController.UpdateAnim(deltaTime);
2659 }

2661
2662 public static void UpdateAll(float deltaTime, Camera cam)
2663 {
2664 if (GameMain.NetworkMember == null || !GameMain.NetworkMember.IsClient)
2665 {
2666 foreach (Character c in CharacterList)
2667 {
2668 if (!(c is AICharacter) && !c.IsRemotePlayer) continue;
2669
2670 if (c.IsPlayer || (c.IsBot && !c.IsDead))
2671 {
2672 c.Enabled = true;
2673 }
2674 else if (GameMain.NetworkMember != null && GameMain.NetworkMember.IsServer)
2675 {
2676 //disable AI characters that are far away from all clients and the host's character and not controlled by anyone
2677 float closestPlayerDist = c.GetDistanceToClosestPlayer();
2678 if (closestPlayerDist > c.Params.DisableDistance)
2679 {
2680 c.Enabled = false;
2681 if (c.IsDead && c.AIController is EnemyAIController)
2682 {
2683 Spawner?.AddEntityToRemoveQueue(c);
2684 }
2685 }
2686 else if (closestPlayerDist < c.Params.DisableDistance * 0.9f)
2687 {
2688 c.Enabled = true;
2689 }
2690 }
2691 else if (Submarine.MainSub != null)
2692 {
2693 //disable AI characters that are far away from the sub and the controlled character
2694 float distSqr = Vector2.DistanceSquared(Submarine.MainSub.WorldPosition, c.WorldPosition);
2695 if (Controlled != null)
2696 {
2697 distSqr = Math.Min(distSqr, Vector2.DistanceSquared(Controlled.WorldPosition, c.WorldPosition));
2698 }
2699 else
2700 {
2701 distSqr = Math.Min(distSqr, Vector2.DistanceSquared(GameMain.GameScreen.Cam.GetPosition(), c.WorldPosition));
2702 }
2703
2704 if (distSqr > MathUtils.Pow2(c.Params.DisableDistance))
2705 {
2706 c.Enabled = false;
2707 if (c.IsDead && c.AIController is EnemyAIController)
2708 {
2709 Entity.Spawner?.AddEntityToRemoveQueue(c);
2710 }
2711 }
2712 else if (distSqr < MathUtils.Pow2(c.Params.DisableDistance * 0.9f))
2713 {
2714 c.Enabled = true;
2715 }
2716 }
2717 }
2718 }
2719
2720 characterUpdateTick++;
2721
2722 if (characterUpdateTick % CharacterUpdateInterval == 0)
2723 {
2724 for (int i = 0; i < CharacterList.Count; i++)
2725 {
2726 if (GameMain.LuaCs.Game.updatePriorityCharacters.Contains(CharacterList[i])) continue;
2727
2728 CharacterList[i].Update(deltaTime * CharacterUpdateInterval, cam);
2729 }
2730 }
2731
2732 foreach (Character character in GameMain.LuaCs.Game.updatePriorityCharacters)
2733 {
2734 if (character.Removed) continue;
2735
2736 character.Update(deltaTime, cam);
2737 }
2738 }
2739
2740 public virtual void Update(float deltaTime, Camera cam)
2741 {
2742 UpdateProjSpecific(deltaTime, cam);
2743
2744 KnockbackCooldownTimer -= deltaTime;
2745
2746 if (GameMain.NetworkMember != null && GameMain.NetworkMember.IsClient && this == Controlled && !isSynced) { return; }
2747
2748 UpdateDespawn(deltaTime);
2749
2750 if (!Enabled) { return; }
2751
2752 if (Level.Loaded != null)
2753 {
2754 if (WorldPosition.Y < Level.MaxEntityDepth ||
2755 (Submarine != null && Submarine.WorldPosition.Y < Level.MaxEntityDepth))
2756 {
2757 Enabled = false;
2758 Kill(CauseOfDeathType.Pressure, null);
2759 return;
2760 }
2761 }
2762
2763 ApplyStatusEffects(ActionType.Always, deltaTime);
2764
2765 PreviousHull = CurrentHull;
2766 CurrentHull = Hull.FindHull(WorldPosition, CurrentHull, useWorldCoordinates: true);
2767
2768 speechBubbleTimer = Math.Max(0.0f, speechBubbleTimer - deltaTime);
2769
2770 obstructVisionAmount = Math.Max(obstructVisionAmount - deltaTime, 0.0f);
2771
2772 if (Inventory != null)
2773 {
2774 foreach (Item item in Inventory.AllItems)
2775 {
2776 if (item.body == null || item.body.Enabled) { continue; }
2777 item.SetTransform(SimPosition, 0.0f);
2778 item.Submarine = Submarine;
2779 }
2780 }
2781
2782 HideFace = false;
2783
2784 UpdateSightRange(deltaTime);
2785 UpdateSoundRange(deltaTime);
2786
2787 UpdateAttackers(deltaTime);
2788
2789 foreach (var characterTalent in characterTalents)
2790 {
2791 characterTalent.UpdateTalent(deltaTime);
2792 }
2793
2794 if (IsDead) { return; }
2795
2796 if (GameMain.NetworkMember != null)
2797 {
2798 UpdateNetInput();
2799 }
2800 else
2801 {
2802 AnimController.Frozen = false;
2803 }
2804
2805 DisableImpactDamageTimer -= deltaTime;
2806
2807 if (!speechImpedimentSet)
2808 {
2809 //if no statuseffect or anything else has set a speech impediment, allow speaking normally
2810 speechImpediment = 0.0f;
2811 }
2812 speechImpedimentSet = false;
2813
2814 if (NeedsAir)
2815 {
2816 //implode if not protected from pressure, and either outside or in a high-pressure hull
2817 if (!IsProtectedFromPressure() &&
2818 (AnimController.CurrentHull == null || AnimController.CurrentHull.LethalPressure >= 80.0f))
2819 {
2820 if (CharacterHealth.PressureKillDelay <= 0.0f)
2821 {
2822 PressureTimer = 100.0f;
2823 }
2824 else
2825 {
2826 PressureTimer += ((AnimController.CurrentHull == null) ?
2827 100.0f : AnimController.CurrentHull.LethalPressure) / CharacterHealth.PressureKillDelay * deltaTime;
2828 }
2829
2830 if (PressureTimer >= 100.0f)
2831 {
2832 if (Controlled == this) { cam.Zoom = 5.0f; }
2833 if (GameMain.NetworkMember == null || !GameMain.NetworkMember.IsClient)
2834 {
2835 Implode();
2836 if (IsDead) { return; }
2837 }
2838 }
2839 }
2840 else
2841 {
2842 PressureTimer = 0.0f;
2843 }
2844 }
2845 else if ((GameMain.NetworkMember == null || !GameMain.NetworkMember.IsClient) &&
2846 PressureProtection < (Level.Loaded?.GetRealWorldDepth(WorldPosition.Y) ?? 1.0f) &&
2847 WorldPosition.Y < CharacterHealth.CrushDepth)
2848 {
2849 //implode if below crush depth, and either outside or in a high-pressure hull
2850 if (AnimController.CurrentHull == null || AnimController.CurrentHull.LethalPressure >= 80.0f)
2851 {
2852 Implode();
2853 if (IsDead) { return; }
2854 }
2855 }
2856
2857 ApplyStatusEffects(AnimController.InWater ? ActionType.InWater : ActionType.NotInWater, deltaTime);
2858 ApplyStatusEffects(ActionType.OnActive, deltaTime);
2859
2860 if (aiTarget != null)
2861 {
2862 aiTarget.InDetectable = false;
2863 }
2864
2865 UpdateControlled(deltaTime, cam);
2866
2867 //Health effects
2868 if (NeedsOxygen)
2869 {
2870 UpdateOxygen(deltaTime);
2871 }
2872
2873 CalculateHealthMultiplier();
2874 CharacterHealth.Update(deltaTime);
2875
2876 if (IsIncapacitated)
2877 {
2878 Stun = Math.Max(5.0f, Stun);
2879 AnimController.ResetPullJoints();
2880 SelectedConstruction = null;
2881 return;
2882 }
2883
2884 UpdateAIChatMessages(deltaTime);
2885
2886 //Do ragdoll shenanigans before Stun because it's still technically a stun, innit? Less network updates for us!
2887 bool allowRagdoll = GameMain.NetworkMember?.ServerSettings?.AllowRagdollButton ?? true;
2888 bool tooFastToUnragdoll = AnimController.Collider.LinearVelocity.LengthSquared() > 8.0f * 8.0f;
2889 bool wasRagdolled = false;
2890 bool selfRagdolled = false;
2891
2892 if (IsForceRagdolled)
2893 {
2894 IsRagdolled = IsForceRagdolled;
2895 }
2896 else if (this != Controlled)
2897 {
2898 wasRagdolled = IsRagdolled;
2899 IsRagdolled = selfRagdolled = IsKeyDown(InputType.Ragdoll);
2900 }
2901 //Keep us ragdolled if we were forced or we're too speedy to unragdoll
2902 else if (allowRagdoll && (!IsRagdolled || !tooFastToUnragdoll))
2903 {
2904 if (ragdollingLockTimer > 0.0f)
2905 {
2906 SetInput(InputType.Ragdoll, false, true);
2907 ragdollingLockTimer -= deltaTime;
2908 }
2909 else
2910 {
2911 wasRagdolled = IsRagdolled;
2912 IsRagdolled = selfRagdolled = IsKeyDown(InputType.Ragdoll); //Handle this here instead of Control because we can stop being ragdolled ourselves
2913 if (wasRagdolled != IsRagdolled) { ragdollingLockTimer = 0.5f; }
2914 }
2915 }
2916
2917 if (!wasRagdolled && IsRagdolled)
2918 {
2919 if (selfRagdolled)
2920 {
2921 CheckTalents(AbilityEffectType.OnSelfRagdoll);
2922 }
2923 // currently does not work when you are stunned, like it should
2924 CheckTalents(AbilityEffectType.OnRagdoll);
2925 }
2926
2927 lowPassMultiplier = MathHelper.Lerp(lowPassMultiplier, 1.0f, 0.1f);
2928
2929 //ragdoll button
2930 if (IsRagdolled || !CanMove)
2931 {
2932 if (AnimController is HumanoidAnimController humanAnimController)
2933 {
2934 humanAnimController.Crouching = false;
2935 }
2936 AnimController.ResetPullJoints();
2937 SelectedConstruction = null;
2938 return;
2939 }
2940
2941 //AI and control stuff
2942
2943 Control(deltaTime, cam);
2944
2945 bool isNotControlled = Controlled != this;
2946
2947 if (isNotControlled && (!(this is AICharacter) || IsRemotePlayer))
2948 {
2949 Vector2 mouseSimPos = ConvertUnits.ToSimUnits(cursorPosition);
2950 DoInteractionUpdate(deltaTime, mouseSimPos);
2951 }
2952
2953 if (SelectedConstruction != null && !CanInteractWith(SelectedConstruction))
2954 {
2955 SelectedConstruction = null;
2956 }
2957
2958 if (!IsDead) { LockHands = false; }
2959 }

2962
2963 partial void UpdateProjSpecific(float deltaTime, Camera cam);
2964
2965 partial void SetOrderProjSpecific(Order order);
2966
2967
2968 public void AddAttacker(Character character, float damage)
2969 {
2970 Attacker attacker = lastAttackers.FirstOrDefault(a => a.Character == character);
2971 if (attacker != null)
2972 {
2973 lastAttackers.Remove(attacker);
2974 }
2975 else
2976 {
2977 attacker = new Attacker { Character = character };
2978 }
2979
2980 if (lastAttackers.Count > maxLastAttackerCount)
2981 {
2982 lastAttackers.RemoveRange(0, lastAttackers.Count - maxLastAttackerCount);
2983 }
2984
2985 attacker.Damage += damage;
2986 lastAttackers.Add(attacker);
2987 }

2989 public void ForgiveAttacker(Character character)
2990 {
2991 int index;
2992 if ((index = lastAttackers.FindIndex(a => a.Character == character)) >= 0)
2993 {
2994 lastAttackers.RemoveAt(index);
2995 }
2996 }

2999 {
3000 if (otherCharacter == null) { return 0; }

3010 private void UpdateAttackers(float deltaTime)
3011 {
3012 //slowly forget about damage done by attackers
3013 foreach (Attacker enemy in LastAttackers)
3014 {
3015 float cumulativeDamage = enemy.Damage;
3016 if (cumulativeDamage > 0)
3017 {
3018 float reduction = deltaTime;
3019 if (cumulativeDamage < 2)
3020 {
3021 // If the damage is very low, let's not forget so quickly, or we can't cumulate the damage from repair tools (high frequency, low damage)
3022 reduction *= 0.5f;
3023 }
3024 enemy.Damage = Math.Max(0.0f, enemy.Damage - reduction);
3025 }
3026 }
3027 }

3029 private void UpdateOxygen(float deltaTime)
3030 {
3031 if (NeedsAir)
3032 {
3033 if (Timing.TotalTime > pressureProtectionLastSet + 0.1)
3034 {
3035 pressureProtection = 0.0f;
3036 }
3037 }
3038 if (NeedsWater)
3039 {
3040 float waterAvailable = 100;
3041 if (!AnimController.InWater && CurrentHull != null)
3042 {
3043 waterAvailable = CurrentHull.WaterPercentage;
3044 }
3045 OxygenAvailable += MathHelper.Clamp(waterAvailable - oxygenAvailable, -deltaTime * 50.0f, deltaTime * 50.0f);
3046 }
3047 else
3048 {
3049 float hullAvailableOxygen = 0.0f;
3050 if (!AnimController.HeadInWater && AnimController.CurrentHull != null)
3051 {
3052 //don't decrease the amount of oxygen in the hull if the character has more oxygen available than the hull
3053 //(i.e. if the character has some external source of oxygen)
3054 if (OxygenAvailable * 0.98f < AnimController.CurrentHull.OxygenPercentage && UseHullOxygen)
3055 {
3056 AnimController.CurrentHull.Oxygen -= Hull.OxygenConsumptionSpeed * deltaTime;
3057 }
3058 hullAvailableOxygen = AnimController.CurrentHull.OxygenPercentage;
3059
3060 }
3061 OxygenAvailable += MathHelper.Clamp(hullAvailableOxygen - oxygenAvailable, -deltaTime * 50.0f, deltaTime * 50.0f);
3062 }
3063 UseHullOxygen = true;
3064 }

3069 protected float GetDistanceToClosestPlayer()
3070 {
3071 return (float)Math.Sqrt(GetDistanceSqrToClosestPlayer());
3072 }
3073
3077 protected float GetDistanceSqrToClosestPlayer()
3078 {
3079 float distSqr = float.MaxValue;
3080 foreach (Character otherCharacter in CharacterList)
3081 {
3082 if (otherCharacter == this || !otherCharacter.IsRemotePlayer) { continue; }
3083 distSqr = Math.Min(distSqr, Vector2.DistanceSquared(otherCharacter.WorldPosition, WorldPosition));
3084 if (otherCharacter.ViewTarget != null)
3085 {
3086 distSqr = Math.Min(distSqr, Vector2.DistanceSquared(otherCharacter.ViewTarget.WorldPosition, WorldPosition));
3087 }
3088 }
3089#if SERVER
3090 for (int i = 0; i < GameMain.Server.ConnectedClients.Count; i++)
3091 {
3092 var spectatePos = GameMain.Server.ConnectedClients[i].SpectatePos;
3093 if (spectatePos != null)
3094 {
3095 distSqr = Math.Min(distSqr, Vector2.DistanceSquared(spectatePos.Value, WorldPosition));
3096 }
3097 }
3098#else
3099 if (this == Controlled) { return 0.0f; }
3100 if (controlled != null)
3101 {
3102 distSqr = Math.Min(distSqr, Vector2.DistanceSquared(Controlled.WorldPosition, WorldPosition));
3103 }
3104 distSqr = Math.Min(distSqr, Vector2.DistanceSquared(GameMain.GameScreen.Cam.Position, WorldPosition));
3105#endif
3106 return distSqr;
3107 }

3109 private float despawnTimer;
3110 private void UpdateDespawn(float deltaTime, bool ignoreThresholds = false, bool createNetworkEvents = true)
3111 {
3112 if (!EnableDespawn) { return; }
3113
3114 //clients don't despawn characters unless the server says so
3115 if (GameMain.NetworkMember != null && !GameMain.NetworkMember.IsServer) { return; }
3116
3117 if (!IsDead || (CauseOfDeath?.Type == CauseOfDeathType.Disconnected && GameMain.GameSession?.Campaign != null)) { return; }
3118
3119 int subCorpseCount = 0;
3120
3121 if (Submarine != null && !ignoreThresholds)
3122 {
3123 subCorpseCount = CharacterList.Count(c => c.IsDead && c.Submarine == Submarine);
3124 if (subCorpseCount < GameSettings.CurrentConfig.CorpsesPerSubDespawnThreshold) { return; }
3125 }
3126
3127 if (SelectedBy != null)
3128 {
3129 despawnTimer = 0.0f;
3130 return;
3131 }
3132
3133 float distToClosestPlayer = GetDistanceToClosestPlayer();
3134 if (distToClosestPlayer > Params.DisableDistance)
3135 {
3136 //despawn in 1 minute if very far from all human players
3137 despawnTimer = Math.Max(despawnTimer, GameSettings.CurrentConfig.CorpseDespawnDelay - 60.0f);
3138 }
3139
3140 float despawnPriority = 1.0f;
3141 if (subCorpseCount > GameSettings.CurrentConfig.CorpsesPerSubDespawnThreshold)
3142 {
3143 //despawn faster if there are lots of corpses in the sub (twice as many as the threshold -> despawn twice as fast)
3144 despawnPriority += (subCorpseCount - GameSettings.CurrentConfig.CorpsesPerSubDespawnThreshold) / (float)GameSettings.CurrentConfig.CorpsesPerSubDespawnThreshold;
3145 }
3146 if (AIController is EnemyAIController)
3147 {
3148 //enemies despawn faster
3149 despawnPriority *= 2.0f;
3150 }
3151
3152 despawnTimer += deltaTime * despawnPriority;
3153 if (despawnTimer < GameSettings.CurrentConfig.CorpseDespawnDelay) { return; }
3154
3155 if (IsHuman)
3156 {
3157 var containerPrefab =
3158 ItemPrefab.Prefabs.Find(me => me.Tags.Contains("despawncontainer")) ??
3159 (MapEntityPrefab.FindByIdentifier("metalcrate".ToIdentifier()) as ItemPrefab);
3160 if (containerPrefab == null)
3161 {
3162 DebugConsole.NewMessage("Could not spawn a container for a despawned character's items. No item with the tag \"despawncontainer\" or the identifier \"metalcrate\" found.", Color.Red);
3163 }
3164 else
3165 {
3166 Spawner?.AddItemToSpawnQueue(containerPrefab, WorldPosition, onSpawned: onItemContainerSpawned);
3167 }
3168
3169 void onItemContainerSpawned(Item item)
3170 {
3171 if (Inventory == null) { return; }
3172
3173 item.UpdateTransform();
3174 item.AddTag("name:" + Name);
3175 if (info?.Job != null) { item.AddTag($"job:{info.Job.Name}"); }
3176
3177 var itemContainer = item?.GetComponent<ItemContainer>();
3178 if (itemContainer == null) { return; }
3179 List<Item> inventoryItems = new List<Item>(Inventory.AllItemsMod);
3180 foreach (Item inventoryItem in inventoryItems)
3181 {
3182 if (!itemContainer.Inventory.TryPutItem(inventoryItem, user: null, createNetworkEvent: createNetworkEvents))
3183 {
3184 //if the item couldn't be put inside the despawn container, just drop it
3185 inventoryItem.Drop(dropper: this, createNetworkEvent: createNetworkEvents);
3186 }
3187 }
3188 //this needs to happen after the items have been dropped (we can no longer sync dropping the items if the character has been removed)
3189 Spawner.AddEntityToRemoveQueue(this);
3190 }
3191 }
3192 else
3193 {
3194 Spawner.AddEntityToRemoveQueue(this);
3195 }
3196 }
3197
3198 public void DespawnNow(bool createNetworkEvents = true)
3199 {
3200 despawnTimer = GameSettings.CurrentConfig.CorpseDespawnDelay;
3201 UpdateDespawn(1.0f, ignoreThresholds: true, createNetworkEvents: createNetworkEvents);
3202 //update twice: first to spawn the duffel bag and move the items into it, then to remove the character
3203 for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++)
3204 {
3205 Spawner.Update(createNetworkEvents);
3206 }
