3225 private void UpdateSightRange(float deltaTime)
3226 {
3227 if (aiTarget == null) { return; }
3228 float minRange = Math.Clamp((float)Math.Sqrt(Mass) * Visibility, 250, 1000);
3229 float massFactor = (float)Math.Sqrt(Mass / 20);
3230 float targetRange = Math.Min(minRange + massFactor * AnimController.Collider.LinearVelocity.Length() * 2 * Visibility, maxAIRange);
3231 float newRange = MathHelper.SmoothStep(aiTarget.SightRange, targetRange, deltaTime * aiTargetChangeSpeed);
3232 if (!float.IsNaN(newRange))
3233 {
3234 aiTarget.SightRange = newRange;
3235 }
3236 }

3244 }
3245 else
3246 {
3247 float massFactor = (float)Math.Sqrt(Mass / 10);
3248 float targetRange = Math.Min(massFactor * AnimController.Collider.LinearVelocity.Length() * 2 * Noise, maxAIRange);
3249 float newRange = MathHelper.SmoothStep(aiTarget.SoundRange, targetRange, deltaTime * aiTargetChangeSpeed);
3250 if (!float.IsNaN(newRange))

3252 aiTarget.SoundRange = newRange;

3257 public bool CanHearCharacter(Character speaker)

3260 if (speaker == this) { return true; }

3262 ChatMessageType.Radio :

3268 public void SetOrder(Order order, bool isNewOrder, bool speak = true, bool force = false)
3269 {
3270 var orderGiver = order?.OrderGiver;
3271 //set the character order only if the character is close enough to hear the message
3272 if (!force && orderGiver != null && !CanHearCharacter(orderGiver)) { return; }
3273
3274 if (order != null)
3275 {
3276 if (order.AutoDismiss)
3277 {
3278 switch (order.Category)
3279 {
3280 case OrderCategory.Operate when order.TargetEntity != null:
3281 // If there's another character operating the same device, make them dismiss themself
3282 foreach (var character in CharacterList)
3283 {
3284 if (character == this) { continue; }
3285 if (character.TeamID != TeamID) { continue; }
3286 if (!(character.AIController is HumanAIController)) { continue; }
3287 if (!HumanAIController.IsActive(character)) { continue; }
3288 foreach (var currentOrder in character.CurrentOrders)
3289 {
3290 if (currentOrder == null) { continue; }
3291 if (currentOrder.Category != OrderCategory.Operate) { continue; }
3292 if (currentOrder.Identifier != order.Identifier) { continue; }
3293 if (currentOrder.TargetEntity != order.TargetEntity) { continue; }
3294 if (!currentOrder.AutoDismiss) { continue; }
3295 character.SetOrder(currentOrder.GetDismissal(), isNewOrder, speak: speak, force: force);
3296 break;
3297 }
3298 }
3299 break;
3300 case OrderCategory.Movement:
3301 // If there character has another movement order, dismiss that order
3302 Order orderToReplace = null;
3303 foreach (var currentOrder in CurrentOrders)
3304 {
3305 if (currentOrder == null) { continue; }
3306 if (currentOrder.Category != OrderCategory.Movement) { continue; }
3307 orderToReplace = currentOrder;
3308 break;
3309 }
3310 if (orderToReplace is { AutoDismiss: true })
3311 {
3312 SetOrder(orderToReplace.GetDismissal(), isNewOrder, speak: speak, force: force);
3313 }
3314 break;
3315 }
3316 }
3317 }
3318
3319 // Prevent adding duplicate orders
3320 RemoveDuplicateOrders(order);
3321 AddCurrentOrder(order);
3322
3323 if (orderGiver != null && order.Identifier != "dismissed" && isNewOrder)
3324 {
3325 var abilityOrderedCharacter = new AbilityOrderedCharacter(this);
3326 orderGiver.CheckTalents(AbilityEffectType.OnGiveOrder, abilityOrderedCharacter);
3327
3328 if (order.OrderGiver.LastOrderedCharacter != this)
3329 {
3330 order.OrderGiver.SecondLastOrderedCharacter = order.OrderGiver.LastOrderedCharacter;
3331 order.OrderGiver.LastOrderedCharacter = this;
3332 }
3333 }
3334
3335 if (AIController is HumanAIController humanAI)
3336 {
3337 humanAI.SetOrder(order, speak);
3338 }
3339 SetOrderProjSpecific(order);
3340 }

3342 private void AddCurrentOrder(Order newOrder)
3343 {
3344 if (newOrder == null || newOrder.Identifier == "dismissed")
3345 {
3346 if (newOrder.Option != Identifier.Empty)
3347 {
3348 if (CurrentOrders.Any(o => o.MatchesDismissedOrder(newOrder.Option)))
3349 {
3350 var dismissedOrderInfo = CurrentOrders.First(o => o.MatchesDismissedOrder(newOrder.Option));
3351 int dismissedOrderPriority = dismissedOrderInfo.ManualPriority;
3352 CurrentOrders.Remove(dismissedOrderInfo);
3353 for (int i = 0; i < CurrentOrders.Count; i++)
3354 {
3355 var orderInfo = CurrentOrders[i];
3356 if (orderInfo.ManualPriority < dismissedOrderPriority)
3357 {
3358 CurrentOrders[i] = orderInfo.WithManualPriority(orderInfo.ManualPriority + 1);
3359 }
3360 }
3361 }
3362 }
3363 else
3364 {
3365 CurrentOrders.Clear();
3366 }
3367 }
3368 else
3369 {
3370 for (int i = 0; i < CurrentOrders.Count; i++)
3371 {
3372 var orderInfo = CurrentOrders[i];
3373 if (orderInfo.ManualPriority <= newOrder.ManualPriority)
3374 {
3375 CurrentOrders[i] = orderInfo.WithManualPriority(orderInfo.ManualPriority - 1);
3376 }
3377 }
3378 CurrentOrders.RemoveAll(order => order.ManualPriority <= 0);
3379 CurrentOrders.Add(newOrder);
3380 // Sort the current orders so the one with the highest priority comes first
3381 CurrentOrders.Sort((x, y) => y.ManualPriority.CompareTo(x.ManualPriority));
3382 }
3383 }
3384
3385 private bool RemoveDuplicateOrders(Order order)
3386 {
3387 bool removed = false;
3388 int? priorityOfRemoved = null;
3389 for (int i = CurrentOrders.Count - 1; i >= 0; i--)
3390 {
3391 var orderInfo = CurrentOrders[i];
3392 if (order.Identifier == orderInfo.Identifier)
3393 {
3394 priorityOfRemoved = orderInfo.ManualPriority;
3395 CurrentOrders.RemoveAt(i);
3396 removed = true;
3397 break;
3398 }
3399 }
3400
3401 if (!priorityOfRemoved.HasValue) { return removed; }
3402
3403 for (int i = 0; i < CurrentOrders.Count; i++)
3404 {
3405 var orderInfo = CurrentOrders[i];
3406 if (orderInfo.ManualPriority < priorityOfRemoved.Value)
3407 {
3408 CurrentOrders[i] = orderInfo.WithManualPriority(orderInfo.ManualPriority + 1);
3409 }
3410 }
3411
3412 CurrentOrders.RemoveAll(order => order.ManualPriority <= 0);
3413 // Sort the current orders so the one with the highest priority comes first
3414 CurrentOrders.Sort((x, y) => y.ManualPriority.CompareTo(x.ManualPriority));
3415
3416 return removed;
3417 }

3425 if (orderInfo.ManualPriority < 1) { return false; }
3426 return true;

3450 private readonly List<AIChatMessage> aiChatMessageQueue = new List<AIChatMessage>();
3451
3452 //key = identifier, value = time the message was sent
3453 private readonly Dictionary<Identifier, float> prevAiChatMessages = new Dictionary<Identifier, float>();
3454

3468 public void Speak(string message, ChatMessageType? messageType = null, float delay = 0.0f, Identifier identifier = default, float minDurationBetweenSimilar = 0.0f)
3469 {
3470 if (GameMain.NetworkMember != null && GameMain.NetworkMember.IsClient) { return; }
3471 if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(message)) { return; }
3472
3473 if (SpeechImpediment >= 100.0f) { return; }
3474
3475 if (prevAiChatMessages.ContainsKey(identifier) &&
3476 prevAiChatMessages[identifier] < Timing.TotalTime - minDurationBetweenSimilar)
3477 {
3478 prevAiChatMessages.Remove(identifier);
3479 }
3480
3481 //already sent a similar message a moment ago
3482 if (identifier != Identifier.Empty && minDurationBetweenSimilar > 0.0f &&
3483 (aiChatMessageQueue.Any(m => m.Identifier == identifier) || prevAiChatMessages.ContainsKey(identifier)))
3484 {
3485 return;
3486 }
3487 aiChatMessageQueue.Add(new AIChatMessage(message, messageType, identifier, delay));
3488 }
3489
3490 private void UpdateAIChatMessages(float deltaTime)
3491 {
3492 if (GameMain.NetworkMember != null && GameMain.NetworkMember.IsClient) { return; }
3493
3494 List<AIChatMessage> sentMessages = new List<AIChatMessage>();
3495 foreach (AIChatMessage message in aiChatMessageQueue)
3496 {
3497 message.SendDelay -= deltaTime;
3498 if (message.SendDelay > 0.0f) { continue; }
3499
3500 if (message.MessageType == null)
3501 {
3502 message.MessageType = ChatMessage.CanUseRadio(this) ? ChatMessageType.Radio : ChatMessageType.Default;
3503 }
3504#if CLIENT
3505 if (GameMain.GameSession?.CrewManager != null && GameMain.GameSession.CrewManager.IsSinglePlayer)
3506 {
3507 string modifiedMessage = ChatMessage.ApplyDistanceEffect(message.Message, message.MessageType.Value, this, Controlled);
3508 if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(modifiedMessage))
3509 {
3510 GameMain.GameSession.CrewManager.AddSinglePlayerChatMessage(info.Name, modifiedMessage, message.MessageType.Value, this);
3511 }
3512 }
3513#endif
3514#if SERVER
3515 if (GameMain.Server != null && message.MessageType != ChatMessageType.Order)
3516 {
3517 GameMain.Server.SendChatMessage(message.Message, message.MessageType.Value, null, this);
3518 }
3519#endif
3520 ShowSpeechBubble(2.0f, ChatMessage.MessageColor[(int)message.MessageType.Value]);
3521 sentMessages.Add(message);
3522 }
3523
3524 foreach (AIChatMessage sent in sentMessages)
3525 {
3526 sent.SendTime = Timing.TotalTime;
3527 aiChatMessageQueue.Remove(sent);
3528 if (sent.Identifier != Identifier.Empty)
3529 {
3530 prevAiChatMessages[sent.Identifier] = (float)sent.SendTime;
3531 }
3532 }
3533
3534 if (prevAiChatMessages.Count > 100)
3535 {
3536 HashSet<Identifier> toRemove = new HashSet<Identifier>();
3537 foreach (KeyValuePair<Identifier,float> prevMessage in prevAiChatMessages)
3538 {
3539 if (prevMessage.Value < Timing.TotalTime - 60.0f)
3540 {
3541 toRemove.Add(prevMessage.Key);
3542 }
3543 }
3544 foreach (Identifier identifier in toRemove)
3545 {
3546 prevAiChatMessages.Remove(identifier);
3547 }
3548 }
3549 }

3563 public AttackResult AddDamage(Character attacker, Vector2 worldPosition, Attack attack, float deltaTime, bool playSound = true)

3571 public AttackResult ApplyAttack(Character attacker, Vector2 worldPosition, Attack attack, float deltaTime, bool playSound = false, Limb targetLimb = null, float penetration = 0f)
3572 {
3573 if (Removed)
3574 {
3575 string errorMsg = "Tried to apply an attack to a removed character ([name]).\n" + Environment.StackTrace.CleanupStackTrace();
3576 DebugConsole.ThrowError(errorMsg.Replace("[name]", Name));
3577 GameAnalyticsManager.AddErrorEventOnce("Character.ApplyAttack:RemovedCharacter", GameAnalyticsManager.ErrorSeverity.Error, errorMsg.Replace("[name]", SpeciesName.Value));
3578 return new AttackResult();
3579 }
3580
3581 Limb limbHit = targetLimb;
3582
3583 float attackImpulse = attack.TargetImpulse + attack.TargetForce * attack.ImpactMultiplier * deltaTime;
3584
3585 AbilityAttackData attackData = new AbilityAttackData(attack, this, attacker);
3586 IEnumerable<Affliction> attackAfflictions;
3587 if (attackData.Afflictions != null)
3588 {
3589 attackAfflictions = attackData.Afflictions.Union(attack.Afflictions.Keys);
3590 }
3591 else
3592 {
3593 attackAfflictions = attack.Afflictions.Keys;
3594 }
3595
3596 var attackResult = targetLimb == null ?
3597 AddDamage(worldPosition, attackAfflictions, attack.Stun, playSound, attackImpulse, out limbHit, attacker, attack.DamageMultiplier * attackData.DamageMultiplier) :
3598 DamageLimb(worldPosition, targetLimb, attackAfflictions, attack.Stun, playSound, attackImpulse, attacker, attack.DamageMultiplier * attackData.DamageMultiplier, penetration: penetration + attackData.AddedPenetration, shouldImplode: attackData.ShouldImplode);
3599
3600 if (attacker != null)
3601 {
3602 var abilityAttackResult = new AbilityAttackResult(attackResult);
3603 attacker.CheckTalents(AbilityEffectType.OnAttackResult, abilityAttackResult);
3604 CheckTalents(AbilityEffectType.OnAttackedResult, abilityAttackResult);
3605 }
3606
3607 if (limbHit == null) { return new AttackResult(); }
3608 Vector2 forceWorld = attack.TargetImpulseWorld + attack.TargetForceWorld * attack.ImpactMultiplier;
3609 if (attacker != null)
3610 {
3611 forceWorld.X *= attacker.AnimController.Dir;
3612 }
3613 limbHit.body?.ApplyLinearImpulse(forceWorld * deltaTime, maxVelocity: NetConfig.MaxPhysicsBodyVelocity);
3614 var mainLimb = limbHit.character.AnimController.MainLimb;
3615 if (limbHit != mainLimb)
3616 {
3617 // Always add force to mainlimb
3618 mainLimb.body?.ApplyLinearImpulse(forceWorld * deltaTime, maxVelocity: NetConfig.MaxPhysicsBodyVelocity);
3619 }
3620#if SERVER
3621 if (attacker is Character attackingCharacter && attackingCharacter.AIController == null)
3622 {
3623 StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
3624 sb.Append(GameServer.CharacterLogName(this) + " attacked by " + GameServer.CharacterLogName(attackingCharacter) + ".");
3625 if (attackResult.Afflictions != null)
3626 {
3627 foreach (Affliction affliction in attackResult.Afflictions)
3628 {
3629 if (affliction.Strength == 0.0f) continue;
3630 sb.Append($" {affliction.Prefab.Name}: {affliction.Strength}");
3631 }
3632 }
3633 GameServer.Log(sb.ToString(), ServerLog.MessageType.Attack);
3634 }
3635#endif
3636 // Don't allow beheading for monster attacks, because it happens too frequently (crawlers/tigerthreshers etc attacking each other -> they will most often target to the head)
3637 TrySeverLimbJoints(limbHit, attack.SeverLimbsProbability, attackResult.Damage, allowBeheading: attacker == null || attacker.IsHuman || attacker.IsPlayer, attacker: attacker);
3638
3639 return attackResult;
3640 }
3641
3642 public void TrySeverLimbJoints(Limb targetLimb, float severLimbsProbability, float damage, bool allowBeheading, Character attacker = null)
3643 {
3644 if (GameMain.NetworkMember != null && GameMain.NetworkMember.IsClient) { return; }
3645#if DEBUG
3646 if (targetLimb.character != this)
3647 {
3648 DebugConsole.ThrowError($"{Name} is attempting to sever joints of {targetLimb.character.Name}!");
3649 return;
3650 }
3651#endif
3652 if (damage < targetLimb.Params.MinSeveranceDamage) { return; }
3653 if (!IsDead)
3654 {
3655 if (!allowBeheading && targetLimb.type == LimbType.Head) { return; }
3656 if (!targetLimb.CanBeSeveredAlive) { return; }
3657 }
3658 bool wasSevered = false;
3659 float random = Rand.Value();
3660 foreach (LimbJoint joint in AnimController.LimbJoints)
3661 {
3662 if (!joint.CanBeSevered) { continue; }
3663 // Limb A is where we start creating the joint and LimbB is where the joint ends.
3664 // Normally the joints have been created starting from the body, in which case we'd want to use LimbB e.g. to severe a hand when it's hit.
3665 // But heads are a different case, because many characters have been created so that the head is first and then comes the rest of the body.
3666 // If this is the case, we'll have to use LimbA to decapitate the creature when it's hit on the head. Otherwise decapitation could happen only when we hit the body, not the head.
3667 var referenceLimb = targetLimb.type == LimbType.Head && targetLimb.Params.ID == 0 ? joint.LimbA : joint.LimbB;
3668 if (referenceLimb != targetLimb) { continue; }
3669 float probability = severLimbsProbability;
3670 if (!IsDead)
3671 {
3672 probability *= joint.Params.SeveranceProbabilityModifier;
3673 }
3674 if (probability <= 0) { continue; }
3675 if (random > probability) { continue; }
3676 bool severed = AnimController.SeverLimbJoint(joint);
3677 if (!wasSevered)
3678 {
3679 wasSevered = severed;
3680 }
3681 if (severed)
3682 {
3683 Limb otherLimb = joint.LimbA == targetLimb ? joint.LimbB : joint.LimbA;
3684 otherLimb.body.ApplyLinearImpulse(targetLimb.LinearVelocity * targetLimb.Mass, maxVelocity: NetConfig.MaxPhysicsBodyVelocity * 0.5f);
3685 if (attacker != null)
3686 {
3687 if (statusEffects.TryGetValue(ActionType.OnSevered, out var statusEffectList))
3688 {
3689 foreach (var statusEffect in statusEffectList)
3690 {
3691 statusEffect.SetUser(attacker);
3692 }
3693 }
3694 if (targetLimb.StatusEffects.TryGetValue(ActionType.OnSevered, out var limbStatusEffectList))
3695 {
3696 foreach (var statusEffect in limbStatusEffectList)
3697 {
3698 statusEffect.SetUser(attacker);
3699 }
3700 }
3701 }
3702 ApplyStatusEffects(ActionType.OnSevered, 1.0f);
3703 targetLimb.ApplyStatusEffects(ActionType.OnSevered, 1.0f);
3704 }
3705 }
3706 if (wasSevered && targetLimb.character.AIController is EnemyAIController enemyAI)
3707 {
3708 enemyAI.ReevaluateAttacks();
3709 }
3710 }
3711
3712 public AttackResult AddDamage(Vector2 worldPosition, IEnumerable<Affliction> afflictions, float stun, bool playSound, float attackImpulse = 0.0f, Character attacker = null, float damageMultiplier = 1f)
3713 {
3714 return AddDamage(worldPosition, afflictions, stun, playSound, attackImpulse, out _, attacker, damageMultiplier: damageMultiplier);
3715 }
3716
3717 public AttackResult AddDamage(Vector2 worldPosition, IEnumerable<Affliction> afflictions, float stun, bool playSound, float attackImpulse, out Limb hitLimb, Character attacker = null, float damageMultiplier = 1)
3718 {
3719 hitLimb = null;
3720
3721 if (Removed) { return new AttackResult(); }
3722
3723 float closestDistance = 0.0f;
3724 foreach (Limb limb in AnimController.Limbs)
3725 {
3726 float distance = Vector2.DistanceSquared(worldPosition, limb.WorldPosition);
3727 if (hitLimb == null || distance < closestDistance)
3728 {
3729 hitLimb = limb;
3730 closestDistance = distance;
3731 }
3732 }
3733
3734 return DamageLimb(worldPosition, hitLimb, afflictions, stun, playSound, attackImpulse, attacker, damageMultiplier);
3735 }

3737 public void RecordKill(Character target)
3738 {
3739 var abilityCharacterKill = new AbilityCharacterKill(target, this);
3740 foreach (Character attackerCrewmember in GetFriendlyCrew(this))
3741 {
3742 attackerCrewmember.CheckTalents(AbilityEffectType.OnCrewKillCharacter, abilityCharacterKill);
3743 }
3744 CheckTalents(AbilityEffectType.OnKillCharacter, abilityCharacterKill);
3745
3746 if (!IsOnPlayerTeam) { return; }
3747 if (CreatureMetrics.Instance.Killed.Contains(target.SpeciesName)) { return; }
3748 CreatureMetrics.Instance.Killed.Add(target.SpeciesName);
3749 AddEncounter(target);
3750 }

3753 {
3754 if (!IsOnPlayerTeam) { return; }
3755 if (CreatureMetrics.Instance.Encountered.Contains(other.SpeciesName)) { return; }
3756 CreatureMetrics.Instance.Encountered.Add(other.SpeciesName);
3757 CreatureMetrics.Instance.RecentlyEncountered.Add(other.SpeciesName);
3758 }
3759
3760 public AttackResult DamageLimb(Vector2 worldPosition, Limb hitLimb, IEnumerable<Affliction> afflictions, float stun, bool playSound, float attackImpulse, Character attacker = null, float damageMultiplier = 1, bool allowStacking = true, float penetration = 0f, bool shouldImplode = false)
3761 {
3762 if (Removed) { return new AttackResult(); }
3763
3764 //character inside the sub received damage from a monster outside the sub
3765 //can happen during normal gameplay if someone for example fires a ranged weapon from outside,
3766 //the intention of this error message is to diagnose an issue with monsters being able to damage characters from outside
3767
3768 // Disabled, because this happens every now and then when the monsters can get in and out of the sub.
3769
3770// if (attacker?.AIController is EnemyAIController && Submarine != null && attacker.Submarine == null)
3771// {
3772// string errorMsg = $"Character {Name} received damage from outside the sub while inside (attacker: {attacker.Name})";
3773// GameAnalyticsManager.AddErrorEventOnce("Character.DamageLimb:DamageFromOutside" + Name + attacker.Name,
3774// GameAnalyticsManager.ErrorSeverity.Warning,
3775// errorMsg + "\n" + Environment.StackTrace.CleanupStackTrace());
3776//#if DEBUG
3777// DebugConsole.ThrowError(errorMsg);
3778//#endif
3779// }
3780
3781 SetStun(stun);
3782
3783 if (attacker != null && attacker != this && GameMain.NetworkMember != null && !GameMain.NetworkMember.ServerSettings.AllowFriendlyFire)
3784 {
3785 if (attacker.TeamID == TeamID)
3786 {
3787 afflictions = afflictions.Where(a => a.Prefab.IsBuff);
3788 if (!afflictions.Any()) { return new AttackResult(); }
3789 }
3790 }
3791
3792#if CLIENT
3793 if (Params.UseBossHealthBar && Controlled != null && Controlled.teamID == attacker?.teamID)
3794 {
3795 CharacterHUD.ShowBossHealthBar(this);
3796 }
3797#endif
3798
3799 Vector2 dir = hitLimb.WorldPosition - worldPosition;
3800 if (Math.Abs(attackImpulse) > 0.0f)
3801 {
3802 Vector2 diff = dir;
3803 if (diff == Vector2.Zero) { diff = Rand.Vector(1.0f); }
3804 Vector2 impulse = Vector2.Normalize(diff) * attackImpulse;
3805 Vector2 hitPos = hitLimb.SimPosition + ConvertUnits.ToSimUnits(diff);
3806 hitLimb.body.ApplyLinearImpulse(impulse, hitPos, maxVelocity: NetConfig.MaxPhysicsBodyVelocity * 0.5f);
3807 var mainLimb = hitLimb.character.AnimController.MainLimb;
3808 if (hitLimb != mainLimb)
3809 {
3810 // Always add force to mainlimb
3811 mainLimb.body.ApplyLinearImpulse(impulse, hitPos, maxVelocity: NetConfig.MaxPhysicsBodyVelocity);
3812 }
3813 }
3814 bool wasDead = IsDead;
3815 Vector2 simPos = hitLimb.SimPosition + ConvertUnits.ToSimUnits(dir);
3816 float prevVitality = CharacterHealth.Vitality;
3817 AttackResult attackResult = hitLimb.AddDamage(simPos, afflictions, playSound, damageMultiplier: damageMultiplier, penetration: penetration, attacker: attacker);
3818 CharacterHealth.ApplyDamage(hitLimb, attackResult, allowStacking);
3819 if (shouldImplode)
3820 {
3821 // Only used by assistant's True Potential talent. Has to run here in order to properly give kill credit when it activates.
3822 Implode();
3823 }
3824
3825 if (attacker != this)
3826 {
3827 OnAttacked?.Invoke(attacker, attackResult);
3828 OnAttackedProjSpecific(attacker, attackResult, stun);
3829 if (!wasDead)
3830 {
3831 TryAdjustAttackerSkill(attacker, CharacterHealth.Vitality - prevVitality);
3832 }
3833 };
3834 if (attackResult.Damage > 0)
3835 {
3836 LastDamage = attackResult;
3837 if (attacker != null)
3838 {
3839 AddAttacker(attacker, attackResult.Damage);
3840 AddEncounter(attacker);
3841 attacker.AddEncounter(this);
3842 }
3843 ApplyStatusEffects(ActionType.OnDamaged, 1.0f);
3844 hitLimb.ApplyStatusEffects(ActionType.OnDamaged, 1.0f);
3845 }
3846
3847 return attackResult;
3848 }

3852 public void TryAdjustAttackerSkill(Character attacker, float healthChange)
3853 {
3854 if (attacker == null) { return; }
3855
3856 bool isEnemy = AIController is EnemyAIController || TeamID != attacker.TeamID;
3857 if (isEnemy)
3858 {
3859 if (healthChange < 0.0f)
3860 {
3861 float attackerSkillLevel = attacker.GetSkillLevel("weapons");
3862 attacker.Info?.IncreaseSkillLevel("weapons".ToIdentifier(),
3863 -healthChange * SkillSettings.Current.SkillIncreasePerHostileDamage / Math.Max(attackerSkillLevel, 1.0f));
3864 }
3865 }
3866 else if (healthChange > 0.0f)
3867 {
3868 float attackerSkillLevel = attacker.GetSkillLevel("medical");
3869 attacker.Info?.IncreaseSkillLevel("medical".ToIdentifier(),
3870 healthChange * SkillSettings.Current.SkillIncreasePerFriendlyHealed / Math.Max(attackerSkillLevel, 1.0f));
3871 }
3872 }

3878 public bool IsKnockedDown => IsRagdolled || CharacterHealth.StunTimer > 1.0f || IsIncapacitated;

3880 public void SetStun(float newStun, bool allowStunDecrease = false, bool isNetworkMessage = false)
3881 {
3882 if (GameMain.NetworkMember != null && GameMain.NetworkMember.IsClient && !isNetworkMessage) { return; }
3883 if (Screen.Selected != GameMain.GameScreen) { return; }
3884 if (newStun > 0 && Params.Health.StunImmunity) { return; }
3885 if ((newStun <= Stun && !allowStunDecrease) || !MathUtils.IsValid(newStun)) { return; }
3886 if (Math.Sign(newStun) != Math.Sign(Stun))
3887 {
3888 AnimController.ResetPullJoints();
3889 }
3890 CharacterHealth.Stun = newStun;
3891 if (newStun > 0.0f)
3892 {
3893 SelectedConstruction = null;
3894 }
3895 HealthUpdateInterval = 0.0f;
3896 }

3898 private readonly List<ISerializableEntity> targets = new List<ISerializableEntity>();
3899 public void ApplyStatusEffects(ActionType actionType, float deltaTime)
3900 {
3901 if (actionType == ActionType.OnEating)
3902 {
3903 float eatingRegen = Params.Health.HealthRegenerationWhenEating;
3904 if (eatingRegen > 0)
3905 {
3906 CharacterHealth.ReduceAfflictionOnAllLimbs("damage".ToIdentifier(), eatingRegen * deltaTime);
3907 }
3908 }
3909 if (!statusEffects.TryGetValue(actionType, out var statusEffectList)) { return; }
3910 foreach (StatusEffect statusEffect in statusEffectList)
3911 {
3912 if (statusEffect.type == ActionType.OnDamaged)
3913 {
3914 if (!statusEffect.HasRequiredAfflictions(LastDamage)) { continue; }
3915 if (statusEffect.OnlyPlayerTriggered)
3916 {
3917 if (LastAttacker == null || !LastAttacker.IsPlayer)
3918 {
3919 continue;
3920 }
3921 }
3922 }
3923 if (statusEffect.HasTargetType(StatusEffect.TargetType.NearbyItems) ||
3924 statusEffect.HasTargetType(StatusEffect.TargetType.NearbyCharacters))
3925 {
3926 targets.Clear();
3927 targets.AddRange(statusEffect.GetNearbyTargets(WorldPosition, targets));
3928 statusEffect.Apply(actionType, deltaTime, this, targets);
3929 }
3930 else if (statusEffect.targetLimbs != null)
3931 {
3932 foreach (var limbType in statusEffect.targetLimbs)
3933 {
3934 if (statusEffect.HasTargetType(StatusEffect.TargetType.AllLimbs))
3935 {
3936 // Target all matching limbs
3937 foreach (var limb in AnimController.Limbs)
3938 {
3939 if (limb.IsSevered) { continue; }
3940 if (limb.type == limbType)
3941 {
3942 statusEffect.sourceBody = limb.body;
3943 statusEffect.Apply(actionType, deltaTime, this, limb);
3944 }
3945 }
3946 }
3947 else if (statusEffect.HasTargetType(StatusEffect.TargetType.Limb))
3948 {
3949 // Target just the first matching limb
3950 Limb limb = AnimController.GetLimb(limbType);
3951 if (limb != null)
3952 {
3953 statusEffect.sourceBody = limb.body;
3954 statusEffect.Apply(actionType, deltaTime, this, limb);
3955 }
3956 }
3957 else if (statusEffect.HasTargetType(StatusEffect.TargetType.LastLimb))
3958 {
3959 // Target just the last matching limb
3960 Limb limb = AnimController.Limbs.LastOrDefault(l => l.type == limbType && !l.IsSevered && !l.Hidden);
3961 if (limb != null)
3962 {
3963 statusEffect.sourceBody = limb.body;
3964 statusEffect.Apply(actionType, deltaTime, this, limb);
3965 }
3966 }
3967 }
3968 }
3969 if (statusEffect.HasTargetType(StatusEffect.TargetType.This) || statusEffect.HasTargetType(StatusEffect.TargetType.Character))
3970 {
3971 statusEffect.Apply(actionType, deltaTime, this, this);
3972 }
3973 }
3974 if (actionType != ActionType.OnDamaged && actionType != ActionType.OnSevered)
3975 {
3976 // OnDamaged is called only for the limb that is hit.
3977 AnimController.Limbs.ForEach(l => l.ApplyStatusEffects(actionType, deltaTime));
3978 }
3979 //OnActive effects are handled by the afflictions themselves
3980 if (actionType != ActionType.OnActive)
3981 {
3982 CharacterHealth.ApplyAfflictionStatusEffects(actionType);
3983 }
3984 }

3986 private void Implode(bool isNetworkMessage = false)
3987 {
3988 if (CharacterHealth.Unkillable || GodMode || IsDead) { return; }
3989
3990 if (!isNetworkMessage)
3991 {
3992 if (GameMain.NetworkMember != null && GameMain.NetworkMember.IsClient) { return; }
3993 }
3994
3995 CharacterHealth.ApplyAffliction(null, new Affliction(AfflictionPrefab.Pressure, AfflictionPrefab.Pressure.MaxStrength));
3996 if (isNetworkMessage && GameMain.NetworkMember != null && GameMain.NetworkMember.IsClient && Vitality <= CharacterHealth.MinVitality) { Kill(CauseOfDeathType.Pressure, null, isNetworkMessage: true); }
3997 if (IsDead)
3998 {
3999 BreakJoints();
4000 }
4001 }

4003 public void BreakJoints()
4004 {
4005 Vector2 centerOfMass = AnimController.GetCenterOfMass();
4006 foreach (Limb limb in AnimController.Limbs)
4007 {
4008 if (limb.IsSevered) { continue; }
4009 limb.AddDamage(limb.SimPosition, 500.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f, false);
4010
4011 Vector2 diff = centerOfMass - limb.SimPosition;
4012
4013 if (!MathUtils.IsValid(diff))
4014 {
4015 string errorMsg = "Attempted to apply an invalid impulse to a limb in Character.BreakJoints (" + diff + "). Limb position: " + limb.SimPosition + ", center of mass: " + centerOfMass + ".";
4016 DebugConsole.ThrowError(errorMsg);
4017 GameAnalyticsManager.AddErrorEventOnce("Ragdoll.GetCenterOfMass", GameAnalyticsManager.ErrorSeverity.Error, errorMsg);
4018 return;
4019 }
4020
4021 if (diff == Vector2.Zero) { continue; }
4022 limb.body.ApplyLinearImpulse(diff * 50.0f, maxVelocity: NetConfig.MaxPhysicsBodyVelocity);
4023 }
4024
4025 ImplodeFX();
4026
4027 foreach (var joint in AnimController.LimbJoints)
4028 {
4029 if (joint.LimbA.type == LimbType.Head || joint.LimbB.type == LimbType.Head) { continue; }
4030 if (joint.revoluteJoint != null)
4031 {
4032 joint.revoluteJoint.LimitEnabled = false;
4033 }
4034 }
4035 }

4039 public void Kill(CauseOfDeathType causeOfDeath, Affliction causeOfDeathAffliction, bool isNetworkMessage = false, bool log = true)
4040 {
4041 if (IsDead || CharacterHealth.Unkillable || GodMode) { return; }
4042
4043 HealthUpdateInterval = 0.0f;
4044
4045 //clients aren't allowed to kill characters unless they receive a network message
4046 if (!isNetworkMessage && GameMain.NetworkMember is { IsClient: true })
4047 {
4048 return;
4049 }
4050
4051 if (GameMain.NetworkMember is { IsServer: true })
4052 {
4053 GameMain.NetworkMember.CreateEntityEvent(this, new CharacterStatusEventData());
4054 }
4055
4056 isDead = true;
4057
4058 ApplyStatusEffects(ActionType.OnDeath, 1.0f);
4059
4060 AnimController.Frozen = false;
4061
4062 CauseOfDeath = new CauseOfDeath(
4063 causeOfDeath, causeOfDeathAffliction?.Prefab,
4064 causeOfDeathAffliction?.Source, LastDamageSource);
4065
4066 if (GameAnalyticsManager.SendUserStatistics)
4067 {
4068 string causeOfDeathStr = causeOfDeathAffliction == null ?
4069 causeOfDeath.ToString() : causeOfDeathAffliction.Prefab.Identifier.Value.Replace(" ", "");
4070
4071 string characterType = GetCharacterType(this);
4072 GameAnalyticsManager.AddDesignEvent("Kill:" + characterType + ":" + causeOfDeathStr);
4073 if (CauseOfDeath.Killer != null)
4074 {
4075 GameAnalyticsManager.AddDesignEvent("Kill:" + characterType + ":Killer:" + GetCharacterType(CauseOfDeath.Killer));
4076 }
4077 if (CauseOfDeath.DamageSource != null)
4078 {
4079 string damageSourceStr = CauseOfDeath.DamageSource.ToString();
4080 if (CauseOfDeath.DamageSource is Item damageSourceItem) { damageSourceStr = damageSourceItem.ToString(); }
4081 GameAnalyticsManager.AddDesignEvent("Kill:" + characterType + ":DamageSource:" + damageSourceStr);
4082 }

4084 static string GetCharacterType(Character character)
4085 {
4086 if (character.IsPlayer)
4087 return "Player";
4088 else if (character.AIController is EnemyAIController)
4089 return "Enemy" + character.SpeciesName;
4090 else if (character.AIController is HumanAIController && character.TeamID == CharacterTeamType.Team2)
4091 return "EnemyHuman";
4092 else if (character.Info != null && character.TeamID == CharacterTeamType.Team1)
4093 return "AICrew";
4094 else if (character.Info != null && character.TeamID == CharacterTeamType.FriendlyNPC)
4095 return "FriendlyNPC";
4096 return "Unknown";
4097 }
4098 }
4099
4100 OnDeath?.Invoke(this, CauseOfDeath);
4101
4102 var abilityCharacterKiller = new AbilityCharacterKiller(CauseOfDeath.Killer);
4103 CheckTalents(AbilityEffectType.OnDieToCharacter, abilityCharacterKiller);
4104 CauseOfDeath.Killer?.RecordKill(this);
4105
4106 if (GameMain.GameSession != null && Screen.Selected == GameMain.GameScreen)
4107 {
4108 SteamAchievementManager.OnCharacterKilled(this, CauseOfDeath);
4109 }
4110
4111 KillProjSpecific(causeOfDeath, causeOfDeathAffliction, log);
4112
4113 if (info != null)
4114 {
4115 info.CauseOfDeath = CauseOfDeath;
4116 info.MissionsCompletedSinceDeath = 0;
4117 }
4118 AnimController.movement = Vector2.Zero;
4119 AnimController.TargetMovement = Vector2.Zero;
4120
4121 if (!LockHands)
4122 {
4123 foreach (Item heldItem in HeldItems.ToList())
4124 {
4125 heldItem.Drop(this);
4126 }
4127 }
4128
4129 SelectedConstruction = null;
4130 SelectedCharacter = null;
4131
4132 AnimController.ResetPullJoints();
4133
4134 foreach (var joint in AnimController.LimbJoints)
4135 {
4136 if (joint.revoluteJoint != null)
4137 {
4138 joint.revoluteJoint.MotorEnabled = false;
4139 }
4140 }
4141
4142 GameMain.GameSession?.KillCharacter(this);
4143 }

4147 {

4149 {
4150 DebugConsole.ThrowError("Attempting to revive an already removed character\n" + Environment.StackTrace.CleanupStackTrace());

4268 public static void SaveInventory(Inventory inventory, XElement parentElement)
4269 {
4270 if (inventory == null || parentElement == null) { return; }
4271 var items = inventory.AllItems.Distinct();
4272 foreach (Item item in items)
4273 {
4274 item.Submarine = inventory.Owner.Submarine;
4275 var itemElement = item.Save(parentElement);
4276
4277 List<int> slotIndices = inventory.FindIndices(item);
4278 itemElement.Add(new XAttribute("i", string.Join(",", slotIndices)));
4279
4280 foreach (ItemContainer container in item.GetComponents<ItemContainer>())
4281 {
4282 XElement childInvElement = new XElement("inventory");
4283 itemElement.Add(childInvElement);
4284 SaveInventory(container.Inventory, childInvElement);
4285 }
4286 }
4287 }

4302 private void SpawnInventoryItemsRecursive(Inventory inventory, ContentXElement element, List<Item> extraDuffelBags)
4303 {
4304 foreach (var itemElement in element.Elements())
4305 {
4306 var newItem = Item.Load(itemElement, inventory.Owner.Submarine, createNetworkEvent: true, idRemap: IdRemap.DiscardId);
4307 if (newItem == null) { continue; }
4308
4309 if (!MathUtils.NearlyEqual(newItem.Condition, newItem.MaxCondition) &&
4310 GameMain.NetworkMember != null && GameMain.NetworkMember.IsServer)
4311 {
4312 newItem.CreateStatusEvent();
4313 }
4314#if SERVER
4315 newItem.GetComponent<Terminal>()?.SyncHistory();
4316#endif
4317 int[] slotIndices = itemElement.GetAttributeIntArray("i", new int[] { 0 });
4318 if (!slotIndices.Any())
4319 {
4320 DebugConsole.ThrowError("Invalid inventory data in character \"" + Name + "\" - no slot indices found");
4321 continue;
4322 }
4323
4324 //make sure there's no other item in the slot
4325 //this should not happen normally, but can occur if the character is accidentally given new job items while also loading previous items in the campaign
4326 for (int i = 0; i < inventory.Capacity; i++)
4327 {
4328 if (slotIndices.Contains(i))
4329 {
4330 var existingItem = inventory.GetItemAt(i);
4331 if (existingItem != null && existingItem != newItem && (((MapEntity)existingItem).Prefab != ((MapEntity)newItem).Prefab || existingItem.Prefab.MaxStackSize == 1))
4332 {
4333 DebugConsole.ThrowError($"Error while loading character inventory data. The slot {i} was already occupied by the item \"{existingItem.Name} ({existingItem.ID})\" when loading the item \"{newItem.Name} ({newItem.ID})\"");
4334 existingItem.Drop(null, createNetworkEvent: false);
4335 }
4336 }
4337 }
4338
4339 bool canBePutInOriginalInventory = true;
4340 if (slotIndices[0] >= inventory.Capacity)
4341 {
4342 canBePutInOriginalInventory = false;
4343 //legacy support: before item stacking was implemented, revolver for example had a separate slot for each bullet
4344 //now there's just one, try to put the extra items where they fit (= stack them)
4345 for (int i = 0; i < inventory.Capacity; i++)
4346 {
4347 if (inventory.CanBePutInSlot(newItem, i))
4348 {
4349 slotIndices[0] = i;
4350 canBePutInOriginalInventory = true;
4351 break;
4352 }
4353 }
4354 }
4355 else
4356 {
4357 canBePutInOriginalInventory = inventory.CanBePutInSlot(newItem, slotIndices[0], ignoreCondition: true);
4358 }
4359
4360 if (canBePutInOriginalInventory)
4361 {
4362 inventory.TryPutItem(newItem, slotIndices[0], false, false, null);
4363 newItem.ParentInventory = inventory;
4364
4365 //force the item to the correct slots
4366 // e.g. putting the item in a hand slot will also put it in the first available Any-slot,
4367 // which may not be where it actually was
4368 for (int i = 0; i < inventory.Capacity; i++)
4369 {
4370 if (slotIndices.Contains(i))
4371 {
4372 if (!inventory.GetItemsAt(i).Contains(newItem)) { inventory.ForceToSlot(newItem, i); }
4373 }
4374 else if (inventory.FindIndices(newItem).Contains(i))
4375 {
4376 inventory.ForceRemoveFromSlot(newItem, i);
4377 }
4378 }
4379 }
4380 else
4381 {
4382 // In case the inventory capacity is smaller than it was when saving:
4383 // 1) Spawn a new duffel bag if none yet spawned or if the existing ones aren't enough
4384 if (extraDuffelBags.None(i => i.OwnInventory.CanBePut(newItem)) && ItemPrefab.FindByIdentifier("duffelbag".ToIdentifier()) is ItemPrefab duffelBagPrefab)
4385 {
4386 var hull = Hull.FindHull(WorldPosition, guess: CurrentHull);
4387 var mainSub = Submarine.MainSubs.FirstOrDefault(s => s.TeamID == TeamID);
4388 if ((hull == null || hull.Submarine != mainSub) && mainSub != null)
4389 {
4390 var wp = WayPoint.GetRandom(spawnType: SpawnType.Cargo, sub: mainSub) ?? WayPoint.GetRandom(sub: mainSub);
4391 if (wp != null)
4392 {
4393 hull = Hull.FindHull(wp.WorldPosition);
4394 }
4395 }
4396 var newDuffelBag = new Item(duffelBagPrefab,
4397 hull != null ? CargoManager.GetCargoPos(hull, duffelBagPrefab) : Position,
4398 hull?.Submarine ?? Submarine);
4399 extraDuffelBags.Add(newDuffelBag);
4400#if SERVER
4401 Spawner.CreateNetworkEvent(new EntitySpawner.SpawnEntity(newDuffelBag));
4402#endif
4403 }
4404
4405 // 2) Find a slot for the new item
4406 for (int i = 0; i < extraDuffelBags.Count; i++)
4407 {
4408 var duffelBag = extraDuffelBags[i];
4409 for (int j = 0; j < duffelBag.OwnInventory.Capacity; j++)
4410 {
4411 if (duffelBag.OwnInventory.TryPutItem(newItem, j, false, false, null))
4412 {
4413 newItem.ParentInventory = duffelBag.OwnInventory;
4414 break;
4415 }
4416 }
4417 }
4418 }
4419
4420 int itemContainerIndex = 0;
4421 var itemContainers = newItem.GetComponents<ItemContainer>().ToList();
4422 foreach (var childInvElement in itemElement.Elements())
4423 {
4424 if (itemContainerIndex >= itemContainers.Count) break;
4425 if (!childInvElement.Name.ToString().Equals("inventory", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase)) { continue; }
4426 SpawnInventoryItemsRecursive(itemContainers[itemContainerIndex].Inventory, childInvElement, extraDuffelBags);
4427 itemContainerIndex++;
4428 }
4429 }
4430 }

4440 }
4441 else
4442 {
4443 currentContexts.Add(AttackContext.Ground);
4444 }

4446 {

4456 private readonly List<Hull> visibleHulls = new List<Hull>();
4457 private readonly HashSet<Hull> tempList = new HashSet<Hull>();
4462 public List<Hull> GetVisibleHulls()
4463 {
4464 visibleHulls.Clear();
4465 tempList.Clear();
4466 if (CurrentHull != null)
4467 {
4468 visibleHulls.Add(CurrentHull);
4469 var adjacentHulls = CurrentHull.GetConnectedHulls(true, 1);
4470 float maxDistance = 1000f;
4471 foreach (var hull in adjacentHulls)
4472 {
4473 if (hull.ConnectedGaps.Any(g => g.Open > 0.9f && g.linkedTo.Contains(CurrentHull) &&
4474 Vector2.DistanceSquared(g.WorldPosition, WorldPosition) < Math.Pow(maxDistance / 2, 2)))
4475 {
4476 if (Vector2.DistanceSquared(hull.WorldPosition, WorldPosition) < Math.Pow(maxDistance, 2))
4477 {
4478 visibleHulls.Add(hull);
4479 }
4480 }
4481 }
4482 visibleHulls.AddRange(CurrentHull.GetLinkedEntities(tempList, filter: h =>
4483 {
4484 // Ignore adjacent hulls because they were already handled above
4485 if (adjacentHulls.Contains(h))
4486 {
4487 return false;
4488 }
4489 else
4490 {
4491 if (h.ConnectedGaps.Any(g =>
4492 g.Open > 0.9f &&
4493 Vector2.DistanceSquared(g.WorldPosition, WorldPosition) < Math.Pow(maxDistance / 2, 2) &&
4494 CanSeeTarget(g)))
4495 {
4496 return Vector2.DistanceSquared(h.WorldPosition, WorldPosition) < Math.Pow(maxDistance, 2);
4497 }
4498 else
4499 {
4500 return false;
4501 }
4502 }
4503 }));
4504 }
4505 return visibleHulls;
4506 }

4508 public Vector2 GetRelativeSimPosition(ISpatialEntity target, Vector2? worldPos = null)
4509 {
4510 Vector2 targetPos = target.SimPosition;
4511 if (worldPos.HasValue)
4512 {
4513 Vector2 wp = worldPos.Value;
4514 if (target.Submarine != null)
4515 {
4516 wp -= target.Submarine.Position;
4517 }
4518 targetPos = ConvertUnits.ToSimUnits(wp);
4519 }
4520 if (Submarine == null && target.Submarine != null)
4521 {
4522 // outside and targeting inside
4523 targetPos += target.Submarine.SimPosition;
4524 }
4525 else if (Submarine != null && target.Submarine == null)
4526 {
4527 // inside and targeting outside
4528 targetPos -= Submarine.SimPosition;
4529 }
4530 else if (Submarine != target.Submarine)
4531 {
4532 if (Submarine != null && target.Submarine != null)
4533 {
4534 // both inside, but in different subs
4535 Vector2 diff = Submarine.SimPosition - target.Submarine.SimPosition;
4536 targetPos -= diff;
4537 }
4538 }
4539 return targetPos;
4540 }

4608 public bool GiveTalent(TalentPrefab talentPrefab, bool addingFirstTime = true)
4609 {
4610 if (info == null) { return false; }
4611 info.UnlockedTalents.Add(talentPrefab.Identifier);
4612 if (characterTalents.Any(t => t.Prefab == talentPrefab)) { return false; }
4613#if SERVER
4614 GameMain.NetworkMember.CreateEntityEvent(this, new UpdateTalentsEventData());
4615#endif
4616 CharacterTalent characterTalent = new CharacterTalent(talentPrefab, this);
4617 characterTalents.Add(characterTalent);
4618 characterTalent.ActivateTalent(addingFirstTime);
4619 characterTalent.AddedThisRound = addingFirstTime;
4620
4621 if (addingFirstTime)
4622 {
4623 OnTalentGiven(talentPrefab);
4624 GameAnalyticsManager.AddDesignEvent("TalentUnlocked:" + (info.Job?.Prefab.Identifier ?? "None".ToIdentifier()) + ":" + talentPrefab.Identifier,
4625 GameMain.GameSession?.Campaign?.TotalPlayTime ?? 0.0);
4626 }
4627 return true;
4628 }

4650 return true;

4739 private readonly Dictionary<StatTypes, float> statValues = new Dictionary<StatTypes, float>();
4740
4744 private readonly Dictionary<StatTypes, float> wearableStatValues = new Dictionary<StatTypes, float>();
4745
4746 public float GetStatValue(StatTypes statType)
4747 {
4748 if (!IsHuman) { return 0f; }
4749
4750 float statValue = 0f;
4751 if (statValues.TryGetValue(statType, out float value))
4752 {
4753 statValue += value;
4754 }
4755 if (CharacterHealth != null)
4756 {
4757 statValue += CharacterHealth.GetStatValue(statType);
4758 }
4759 if (Info != null)
4760 {
4761 // could be optimized by instead updating the Character.cs statvalues dictionary whenever the CharacterInfo.cs values change
4762 statValue += Info.GetSavedStatValue(statType);
4763 }
4764 if (wearableStatValues.TryGetValue(statType, out float wearableValue))
4765 {
4766 statValue += wearableValue;
4767 }
4768
4769 return statValue;
4770 }
4771
4772 public void OnWearablesChanged()
4773 {
4774 wearableStatValues.Clear();
4775 for (int i = 0; i < Inventory.Capacity; i++)
4776 {
4777 if (Inventory.SlotTypes[i] != InvSlotType.Any && Inventory.SlotTypes[i] != InvSlotType.LeftHand && Inventory.SlotTypes[i] != InvSlotType.RightHand
4778 && Inventory.GetItemAt(i)?.GetComponent<Wearable>() is Wearable wearable)
4779 {
4780 foreach (var statValuePair in wearable.WearableStatValues)
4781 {
4782 if (wearableStatValues.ContainsKey(statValuePair.Key))
4783 {
4784 wearableStatValues[statValuePair.Key] += statValuePair.Value;
4785 }
4786 else
4787 {
4788 wearableStatValues.Add(statValuePair.Key, statValuePair.Value);
4789 }
4790 }
4791 }
4792 }
4793 }
4794
4795 public void ChangeStat(StatTypes statType, float value)
4796 {
4797 if (statValues.ContainsKey(statType))
4798 {
4799 statValues[statType] += value;
4800 }
4801 else
4802 {
4803 statValues.Add(statType, value);
4804 }
4805 }

4807 private static StatTypes GetSkillStatType(Identifier skillIdentifier)
4808 {
4809 // Using this method to translate between skill identifiers and stat types. Feel free to replace it if there's a better way
4810 switch (skillIdentifier.Value.ToLowerInvariant())
4811 {
4812 case "electrical":
4813 return StatTypes.ElectricalSkillBonus;
4814 case "helm":
4815 return StatTypes.HelmSkillBonus;
4816 case "mechanical":
4817 return StatTypes.MechanicalSkillBonus;
4818 case "medical":
4819 return StatTypes.MedicalSkillBonus;
4820 case "weapons":
4821 return StatTypes.WeaponsSkillBonus;
4822 default:
4823 return StatTypes.None;
4824 }

4905 class AbilityAttackData : AbilityObject, IAbilityCharacter

4914
4915 public AbilityAttackData(Attack sourceAttack, Character target, Character attacker)
4916 {
4917 SourceAttack = sourceAttack;
4918 Character = target;
4919 if (attacker != null)
4920 {
4921 Attacker = attacker;
4922 attacker.CheckTalents(AbilityEffectType.OnAttack, this);
4923 target.CheckTalents(AbilityEffectType.OnAttacked, this);
4924 DamageMultiplier *= 1 + attacker.GetStatValue(StatTypes.AttackMultiplier);
4925 if (attacker.TeamID == target.TeamID)
4926 {
4927 DamageMultiplier *= 1 + attacker.GetStatValue(StatTypes.TeamAttackMultiplier);
4928 }
4929 }
4930 }
